description.en: 1.Review of Electromagnetic Theory2.Ray Tracing in Optical System3.Gaussian Beams in Optical Media4.Optical Resonator and Cavity Theory5.Atomic Radiation6.Laser Oscillation, Amplification, and Excitation7.Laser Characteristics, Category, and Applications

notes: ◎ 專業四選二 B ，系所合開

description.zh: (1) 光纖電纜混合系統 (2) 個人通訊系統 (3) 光纖電話系統 (4) 光纖電纜混合電話系統 (5) 有線電視固網 DWDM 系統 (6) 信號間非線性作用 (7) 類比數位通道的干擾 (8) 脈衝雜訊
description.en: (1)Wire Access in HFC Systems (2)Personal Communication Systems (3)Optical Fiber-Based Phone Systems (4)Hybrid-Fiber-Coax BAsed Phone Systems (5)A Hybrid DWDM System for CATC & Fixed Network System (6)Nonlinear Interaction Between Optical Signaals (7)Crosstalk From Analoy Channels to Digital Channel (8)Clipping-Induced Impulse Noise

name.zh: 光纖有線電視固網信號傳輸系統
name.en: Fiber system for CATV, fixed network

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1) 半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2) 半導體物理特性，(3) 半導體光學特性，(4) 薄膜結構及特性 (包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5) 發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6) 真空系統，(7) 薄膜沉積技術，(8) 磊晶及摻雜，(9) 應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

notes: ◎ 專業四選二 D ，系所合開

description.zh: 本課程的主題將集中於奈米薄膜的光學性質，討論介質以及金屬鍍膜材料所製作的奈米結構。本課程將介紹許多新穎的應用，包括完美抗反射、偏極轉換器、偏極分光器與完美波片。進一步根據局部電漿效應對於金屬與介質複合薄膜的影響可發展超穎材料薄膜。本課程包含設計、製程與量測，透過課程學習，學生可學會奈米光學薄膜的完整知識。(1) 課程簡介 (2) 斜向沉積技術技術 (3) 光學非均向薄膜 (4) 等效介質理論 (5) 表面電漿理論 (6) 長程表面電漿 (7) 超穎材料 (8) 完美抗反射與波板 (9) 感測技術 (10) 仿生薄膜 (11) 偏極態量測 (12) 橢圓偏光儀
description.en: The topics of this course will focus on optical properties of nanostructured thin films. The discussed nanostructures are made of common used dielectric and metal coating materials. Many novel applications including perfect antireflection, polarization converter, beam splitters, and perfect waveplate will be introduced here. Furthermore, deposited metamaterial thin films are developed based on local plasmon effect within the metal-dielectric composite films. This course involves design, fabrication and measurement. The students should have learned and passed the course.(1) Introduction (2) Oblique angle deposition (3) Optical anisotropic thin films (4) Effective Medium Approximation (5) Plasmonics (6) Long range surface plasmon (7) Metamaterials (8) Perfect antireflection and waveplate(9) Sensing technique (10) Bioinspired and biomimetic thin films (11) Polarization measurements (12) Ellipsometry

description.zh: 繞射光學是基於光波繞射的原理，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、此類的微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：1. 光學繞射原理 2. 傅式光學 3. 繞射光學元件之設計方法 4. 繞射光學元件之應用 5. 繞射光學元件之實現與製作
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the principle of diffraction of optical wave and study the means of using the diffraction to perform optical setups in modern optical systems. Diffractive optical element (DOE) can be applied to correct aberrations, light focusing, light splitting, and other novel functions that traditional optical components difficultly or impossibly perform. DOE plays an important role in modern optical technology. The content of this course includes: 1. Principle of optical diffraction, 2. Fourier optics, 3. Design methods of DOE, 4. Applications of DOEs, and 5. Implementation of DOEs.

name.zh: 繞射光學原理與應用含實習
name.en: Theory and Application of Diffractive Optics with Lab practice

description.zh: 導論、積體電路生產介紹、半導體基礎、晶圓製造、加熱製程、微影蝕刻、電漿的基礎原理、離子佈植、化學氣相沉積與介電質薄膜、金屬化製程、化學機械研磨、製程整合、CMOS 製程
description.en: Introduction、Introduction to IC Fabrication、Semiconductor Basics、   Wafer Manufacturing、Thermal Processes、Photolithography and Etch、Plasma Basics、Ion Implantation、CVD and Dielectric Thin Film、  Metallization、CMP 、Process Integration、CMOS Processes

notes: ◎ 光電所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 生化碩；合併博班生化組上課

description.zh: 每週三小時一學分的專業必修課，旨在教導碩一新生學習各種生化工程相關的實驗原理與操作技術，以增進學生在未來進行生化實驗研究的知識與技巧；此外，課程中安排工廠參觀實習，結合學術與產業，豐富學生視野，促進學生對產業界的瞭解。
description.en: The three-hour per week course is designed to teach the 1st year graduate students a variety of biochemical engineering principles and hands-on skills to strengthen their knowledge and skills of the field; The course comes with 1-2 visits to industrial plants to further enrich the students' understanding of the industrial process.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）；結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms. In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

notes: 核心七選二

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

notes: 核心七選二

description.zh: 本課程的目的是提升學生的科技英文技能和協助他們進階職場的實用英語需求。此課程著重於科技英語之閱讀、聽力、口語、寫作、理解、語法規則、詞彙，發音，對話，商務溝通，和專業演講技巧。本課程包括撰寫履歷，面試技巧，軟技能如溝通技巧，職場禮節；email 及電話技巧，出差英語，判斷力，了解國際科技職場環境及工作需求，專業項目策劃及執行。輔導學生如何展現自己優勢及作好個人職業規劃，從而順利邁向成功目標.
description.en: This course aims to educate students in Information Technology English and prepare students for their career advancement. This course focuses on IT science and technology English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary, pronunciation, conversation, communication, and professional presentation skills. This course also covers soft skills such as interview tips, communication, business etiquette, travel English, email English, decision making, understanding international business, global working environment, project management planning and execution. In addition, this course offers personal development for students to discover their personal advantage and perform their career planning for achieving career goals.

notes: 化工碩士班

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 限化工碩選課；合併博班化工組上課

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

notes: 化工所生化所合開

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

notes: 網路預選限 25 人 (研究所); 大三四化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

notes: 化工所生化所合開

description.zh: 本課程說明程序最適化的基本原理，介紹化工程序及能源系統中常見的最適化策略。內容包括：最適化理論及演算法、數學規劃與建模技巧、最適化於化工問題及能源議題之應用。
description.en: This course aims to introduce optimisation basics and common optimisation strategies in chemical processes and energy systems. The contents include optimisation theory and algorithms, mathematical programming and modelling techniques, and applications to chemical engineering problems and energy issues.

description.zh: 在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象 (Global Warming)，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：�X 替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）�X 再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）�X 二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題�XLED 專題等
description.en: Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

name.zh: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

notes: 日職化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力與智財管理能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.

name.en: Management of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property

notes: 大四化工所合開

description.zh: 光電化學即利用太陽光能源或其他光源驅使一個完整的電化學氧化還原反應，並充分使用光電催化反應後產生的電子轉換為電力，即為太陽能電池，其中有機材料、無機材料與電解質為太陽光電池反應時主要的影響因素。本課程將會介紹光電化學原理與測定，光電催化，光電化學能轉移及儲存，不同材料發展出不同型態的太陽能電池，進而介紹光電化學如何應用於染料敏化太陽能電池。
description.en: The concept of photoelectrochemistry is to utilize the solar energy and other light sources to drive a complete electrochemical oxidation-reduction reaction where the photocatalytic electron reaction has been converted into electrical energy. Photovoltaic cells which also known as solar cells composed of organic and inorganic materials and electrolytes are the great example for the photoelectrochemical reactions. Here the proposed course is constructed to introduce and implement the basic photoelectrochemical principles, measurements, photoelectrocatalysis, photoelectrical charge transfer and the storage of chemical energy. Further the remaining section of this course will be focused on the detailed studies about the development of different inorganic, organic materials for the fabrication of dye-sensitized solar cells.

name.zh: 光電化學與太陽能電池

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 化工所 EOMP 合開 (外籍生或博士以上)

description.zh: 包含 1. 先端材料的基礎知識：如材質及過程，複合構造及組織、材料的力學性質等基本知識。2. 各種複合材料的介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之介紹。3. 對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中，可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: ntroduction to Advanced Materials :including composite materials

description.zh: 本課程以介紹各種金屬表面被覆之基本原理，特性測試及其工程上之應用。內容有擴散被覆、PVD、CVD、電鍍及陽極處理等方法；基本真空技術，被覆層特性，以及表面被覆層之應用。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles of metals surface coating，properties test and its engineering applications.The contents include Diffusion Coatings、PVD、CVD、Electroplatings and Anodic Coatings treatment；Elementary Vacuum Technologies，coating layer properties and its applications.

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論 1.1 陶瓷產品 1.2 陶瓷製程特色 1.3 目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固。液 氣三相反應　2.1 三相反應 2.2 乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1 名詞定義 3.2 粉末規格 3.3 熱化與熱物分析 3.4 粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1 粉碎 4.2 混合 4.3 成團第五章 成形製程 5.1 乾壓法 5.2 注漿法 5.3 塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定 6.1 固液相界面 6.2 帶電界面 6.3 穩定態 6.4 流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統 7.1 水懸浮液 7.2 泥漿性質 7.3 牛頓型懸浮液 7.4 有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程 8.1 壓濾製程 8.2 離心製程 8.3 注漿製程 8.4 乳化及發泡製程 8. 5 其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

notes: 日職材料所合開

description.zh: 本課程探討電子材料性質、固態物理基礎、元件物理等相關內容，強化電子材料與半導體元件技術之關聯性，藉由剖析材料結構與元件電性，深入探討電子元件在實際應用時可能遭遇之材料議題。本課程將介紹多種半導體元件技術應用，內容包括 p-n 接面、發光二極體與太陽能電池等。
description.en: This course will introduce the material properties, the basics of solid-state physics, and semiconductor devices and physics to provide knowledge of electronic materials and modern semiconductor devices. To assess the material and device issues of electronics for practical use, analysis of the material structure and electrical performance are essential. The content will include various semiconductor device technologies, such as p-n junction, light emitted diodes (LEDs), and solar cells.

name.zh: 電子材料與元件技術特論
name.en: Special Topics in Electronic Materials and Devices

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 材料所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程相關之主要數值分析方法及其於大地工程之應用，如有限差分法及有限元素法。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來分析大地工程問題。
description.en: This course introduces two representative numerical methods, i.e.  finite difference method and finite element method, and their application to geotechnical engineering.  Practical engineering problem are illustrated and simulated by numerical methods in the courses.  It aims to train the students to be familiar with either the theorem of numerical analysis or the application to engineering practices.

description.zh: 臺灣島位於西太平洋，就板塊構造運動而言，臺灣上新－更新世的造山運動代表歐亞大陸板塊的前緣和其東側以西北方向前進的菲律賓海洋板塊間的衝撞聚合運動。東臺灣花蓮和臺東間的縱谷，已被認為是兩個板塊間的縫合帶和板塊聚合的邊緣。在臺灣的北部，大陸和島弧的碰撞型式可能是菲律賓海板塊向北傾沒到位於歐亞大陸板塊上的琉球島弧系統之下。但是向南沿東臺灣縱谷，在北緯二十四度以南，板塊隱沒方向發生改變，歐亞大陸板塊於此向東隱沒進入菲律賓海板塊之下。此一特殊的板塊背景造就了臺灣多樣的地質現象・本課程之內容主要探討台灣地區 (包括海域) 自中生代至現代的大地構造演變及其地體構造運動、盆地演化、岩石圈的結構及性質、造山運動機制等各種地質現象。希望能藉由瞭解臺灣區域地質，從而作為探討臺灣地質工程與環境領域之基礎・
description.en: Taiwan island is located on the weastern Pacific Ocean. The plate tectonic setting of Taiwan is the convergence and collision between the western Eurasian plate and the easterly impinging Philippine Sea plate on the Pli-Pleistocene. The Longitudinal Valley between Hualien and Taitung in eastern Taiwan has been recognized as the suture zone between these two plates. In northeastern Taiwan, convergence is marked by northward subduction of the Philippine Sea plate beneath the Ryukyu Arc System on the Eurasian plate along the Ryukyu Trench. The subduction polarity changes at 24°N near Hualien in eastern Taiwan. There plate convergence is marked by eastward subduction of the Eurasian plate underneath the Luzon Arc System on the Philippine Sea plate along the Eastern Longitudinal Valley. This distinctive tectonic setting bas brought up various special geologic phenomena on Taiwan The course is aimed at graduate students in the geological engineering, who wish to gain an insight into the s

name.en: Special Topics on Regional Geology of Taiwan

notes: 材資系館 2 樓

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 本課程專門設置了兩個主要的構面，課程規劃著重於培育未來之企業領導與管理人才與而設置。全球化的競爭使得各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，高階主管面臨 "兩難" 甚至 "多難" 的多元選擇情況下，企業目標與經濟決策時常產生衝突，” 倫理” 的議題因此成為當今高階管理之重要課題之一！ 再者，本課程第二個構面為策略管理，透過教導策略目標的擬定、執行、組織結構以及如何因應組織內外部環境的轉變能帶給 IMBA 課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，同時，配合個案，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與併購和多角化議題等方面相關管理能力之建構。
description.en: More than ever, business leaders are facing even more challenges in the turbulence environment, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects. Two important parts are introduced in IMBA program, which is business ethics and strategic management. The purpose in this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains. How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. Moreover, the topic in strategic management integrates cutting-edge research on topics including competitive advantage, corporate governance, diversification, strategic leadership, technology and innovation, and corporate social responsibility through both theory and case studies. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the st

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 本創新課程主要專為本校管理學院之國際學生而規劃，為了培養      本院畢業之國際管理碩士 IMBA 學生，運用其跨文化之多元優勢，與在本管理學院受多元學門之培育，未來能成為跨國產業界之優秀領導者，貢獻人群。透過動態激盪之個案研討，與實戰模擬，學生們將能啟動其創造力，學習開發與創新思維，進而建立其創造性思考，分析邏輯之架構，與實務界問題解決之道之整合管理能力。學生們亦將學習多元化之企業主題，包括有跨文化之商業交涉與溝通協商，創意之行銷策略，創業家精神，組織發展與團隊管理，領導學等實務模擬。經過整套課程之培育，透過哈佛管理個案與跨文化相關產業之分析與研討，期許 IMBA 國際學生們將建立實際應用到未來之職涯規劃與機會開展之學識，技術與能力，並本著具有仁愛，與誠信正直之寬廣胸懷，進而成為未來之優秀領導人。
description.en: This course is specifically designed for our International MBA studentswho have the heart of passion and willingness to become great leaders after graduation for their future career.  Through dynamic brain-power training, knowledge and intelligence building, case study and international simulations, we will activate the creative genes in each one of our IMBA students.  We will build their creative thinking, analytical reasoning, and problem solving abilities.  In the spirit of inspirational leadership, we will develop their creative marketing, managerial and organizational skills in the process of entrepreneurial case study and simulations.  Students will be able to draw upon their cross-cultural knowledge and learn how to apply what they have learnt in our business schools.  The main topics to be covered include cross-cultural business etiquettes, creative designing, innovative marketing, cross-cultural communication, analytical planning, cross-cultural negotiation, risk-taking, and

name.zh: 跨文化創造力與創業家策略

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括 GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。
description.en: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 管理博班

description.zh: 物流管理包含依照顧客需求，由原料地至消費者間貨物與相關資訊有效率的流動與儲存之管理規劃。本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：1. 物流管理和策略 2. 運輸和配送 3. 保管與包裝 4. 定單處理 5. 採購 6. 物料搬運 7. 物流成本 8. 物流服務 9. 資訊系統 10. 物流生產力衡量 11. 個案實務研討。
description.en: Logistics management includes management planning for the efficient flow and storage of goods and related information from raw materials to consumers in accordance with customer needs. The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place, and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way. The content of the course description: 1. Logistics management & Strategy 2. Transportation 3. Inventory maintenance 4. Order processing 5. Purchasing 6.Warehousing & packaging 7. Materials handling 8. Logistics costs 9. Logistics customer service 10. Productivity measurement. 11. Case study.

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 網路行銷包含資訊技術與行銷觀念，這門課希望融合者兩面的觀點，在使同學了解網路行銷的理論與實務，輔以資料分析之技術，介紹目前常用的推薦系統、客戶分群等行銷資料分析，此外，也輔以期刊論文的研讀來加強同學的學術理論基礎。
description.en: E-Marketing involves information technology and marketing. The course will explore information technology/systems concepts from a non-technical perspective and examine how the marketing function is influenced by emerging technology trends. In addition, some famous e-marketing technique would be introduced in this course including recommender system, customer segmentation and so on.  This course also discusses the journal paper to enhance the students' theoretical bases

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 資財所

description.zh: 一個數據模式是可以用來解釋結構性資料在商業環境下所代表的意義，而數據模組的建立，則是現實世界知訊管理系統中的自然而然產生的普遍結果。上述共同構成了我們當今被稱為數據分析系統，此系統是一種管理工具，提供用於評估及製定決策。本課程旨在介紹基礎數據模組的工具和使用方法以及相關主題，並會包含與強調在商業上的應用，其重點在不確定性模組建立與評估，理解決策的本質，有效利用數據和有限的信息來模擬複雜系統以及優化分配資源。
description.en: A data model describes how structured data is represented in a business environment. Data modeling is a natural consequence of the prevalence of management information systems in the real world. Together they form what in our days has become known as a Data Analytics system that provides management tools to evaluate performance and make decisions. The course aims to introduce the fundamentals of data models tools and methods and related topics. Business applications of the topics covered will be highlighted. The emphasis will be on modeling and evaluating uncertainty, understanding the nature of decision-making, using data and limited information efficiently simulating complex systems, and optimally allocating resources.

name.en: Analysis and Decision Making Using Data

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 管理博班 & 資財所

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 本課程主要包括下列主題：1. 全球企業發展的外在環境、2. 全球技術突破與創新產業、3. 各國研發創新及品牌智財策略、4.IP 產業建置、5. 全球品牌智財市場、6. 全球企業及其智財管理的規劃與移轉、7. 創新研發的保護方式、8. 協同合作與獨立作業的比較、9. 兼顧節稅的智慧財產權開發模式、10. 跨國視野下的法律議題、11. 企業智財部門規劃、12. 併購與智財授權管理、13. 品牌智財的財務價值、14. 著名全球企業智財管理模式。
description.en: This course will focus on the following topics: 1.external environments for corporate developments, 2.new technologies and innovative enterprises, 3. R&D and branding polices of major countries, 4. the establishment of IP industries, 5. global branding markets, 6. the plan and transfer of global enterprises & IP location, 7. the protection of R&D, 8.the choice between joint and individual R&D, 9. tax plan for IP development, 10.IP plan for international industries, 11, the establishment of IP department, 12.M&A and IP, 13.the evaluation of brands & IP, 14.the IP management of well-known global enterprises,

description.zh: NONE
description.en: NONE

description.zh: 請參閱英文說明。
description.en: This is a research-based course. The course covers international IP treaties, IP-related provisions in some free trade agreements, and judicial decisions related to those international IP treaties. Eight research topics will be assigned to the participating students. The research-based course includes:--Module One: International law 101--Module Two: IP treaties; IP provisions in FTAs--Module Three: Case law--Module Four: In-depth studies請參閱英文說明。

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程下學期亦以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，先介紹專利申請之特殊分割程序與改請程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之補充與修正、更正、以及分割改請。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the special procedure for patent division application and patent conversion application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Then, in the "substantive examination" section, topics such as the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, the priority of a patent application, amendments of description, claims and drawings,  division of a patent and conversion of a patent will be sequentially discussed.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (II)

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題 (二)
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence(II)

description.zh: 透過認識紙質、纖維實驗與材質研發的單元設計貫穿、活化課程，也由此串聯課程理念。達到培育美學素養、認識材質特性、應用紙藝與纖維文化。學生可透過選修這門課，養成美學素養、材質特色認識、紙藝與纖維文化應用。課程為理論與實務之結合，包含 : 1. 文化藝術與自然科學知識之傳授。2. 創意設計實作。後者 (2) 可做為檢視學生對前者 (1) 的學習與吸收狀況。作業訓練達到二項目標 : 1. 加強產學合作，強化實務教學。2. 培育紙質與纖維創意設計人才。
description.en: With the help of curricular components of paper qualities, fiber experiments as well as R&D on raw materials, the course essentials can thus be unified and the theme vitalized. WE aim to provide the course with aesthetical principles, knowledge of the raw materials, applied paper craftsmanship and fiber civilization—which will be comprehensively instilled into the course so that the students who take the course will be equipped with a good command on them. The course is made up of both aesthetical theory and practice, including a) knowledge on culture, arts and natural science and b) innovative & creative practice, with the later utilized as criteria to evaluate to what extent the students are successfully trained. The assigned homework is set so as to: 1. Enforce cooperation between industry and academics and strengthen course materials into practice; 2. Train and discipline more design talents in paper qualities and innovation in fiber.

name.en: Paper’s Fiber Culture and Its Application

notes: 限 5 人

description.zh: 本課程在數位化的環境中，以探討文化創意產業知識創造、創意加值、商品化，與事業化為課程目標。課程強調重點如下：1.	數位化市場趨勢研究。2.	創意設計人才培育方式。3.	數位內容創新加值。4.	服務設計創新加值。
description.en: In the course of the digital environment, to explore the cultural and creative industries to create knowledge, creativity bonus, commercialization, and career goals into the curriculum. The course emphasizes emphasis on the following:1. Digital market trends.2. Creative design personnel training mode.3. The digital content creation bonus.4. Service design innovation bonus.

name.zh: 文創數位內容趨勢研究
name.en: Cultural and Creative Digital Content Trend

description.zh: 本課程探討產業發展歷程中，產業文化資產的出現、保存與再利用等課題。透過文獻研讀、議題討論、國內外個案研討、實地參訪、參與學術研討會、作業報告等方式，學習三課題：1. 產業發展歷程中文化資產的出現、保存與再利用；2. 我國產業文化資產清查保存與再生計畫之核心主軸；3. 民間運用產業文化資產開發新事業。
description.en: This course explores the issues of the appearance, preservation and reuse of industrial Cultural Heritage in the process of industrial development. Through the literature study, discussion topics, domestic and foreign case studies, field visits, participation in academic seminars, job reports, etc., to learn 3 topics ：1.The issues of the appearance, preservation and reuse of industrial ccultural heritage in the process of industrial development , 2. The core spindle of Taiwan's Government industrial heritage inventory preservation and regeneration plan, 3. Private sector utilize industrial ccultural heritage to develop new businesses.

name.zh: 產業發展與文化資產專題

description.zh: 「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind) 旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行：我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括：心靈 (Mind)、心流 (Mental Flow)、情緒 (Emotion)、選擇 (Choice)、決定 (Decision)、感官 (Sensations)、直覺 (Intuition)、自我分析 ( Self-Analysis)、單純性 (Simplicity)、潛意識 (Subconscious)、創新 (Novelty)、洞察力 (Insight) 與意志力 (Willpower) 等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
description.en: The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

name.en: The Theory and Practice of the Mind

description.zh: 本課程探究文化保存的各項議題，包含有形無形文化保存的真實性、文化價值的差異與認定、詮釋與再現；同時透過國內外文化保存的實踐案例的分析與討論，思考未來文化保存的多元發展可能性。
description.en: This course aims to understand the concept of cultural preservation, and the methods of doing cultural preservation by examining different case studies in the world. Different issues related to cultural preservation are also discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of cultural heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. A creative practice of cultural preservation will be conducted in this course.

description.zh: 物質文化是人們生活內容的反映留存，也是族群精神信息的窗口。對於文物的品賞鑒定，在針對料、工、型、紋等面向作周全的觀察賞玩中，斷代與辨偽的素養至關緊要。古玉以其珍稀價昂，仿製現象由來久遠，其用力之深，在諸文物項類中，向以精微著稱，因此，據以為文物鑑賞之入門，深刻而切用。本課程即以中國玉器賞鑒要領及收藏心法為授課主軸，會同業師強化陶瓷老件、宗教古畫以及中國三大硬木傢俱的品鑑，並旁涉香學、茶藝道具、衣飾刺繡等雜項組合，令學子在今後品賞現代工藝、創設經紀文創商品間，對於「老味」的韻致，初步養成較高辨識與感受能力，在「新」與「善」的功用考量中，涵詠著「真」與「美」的另類素養。
description.en: Material culture is a reflection of the content of people's lives, and it is also a window for the spiritual information of ethnic groups.For Cultural relics appraisal, in the comprehensive observation and appreciation of materials, crafts, patterns etc.False literacy is crucial. Ancient jade is rare and expensive. Its imitation phenomenon has a long history.Among the various cultural relic items, Xiang is famous for its subtlety. Therefore, it is believed that the entry to the appreciation of cultural relics is profound and useful.This course is based on Chinese jade appreciation and collection methods as the main axis of teaching.Including old ceramics and miscellaneous items such as China's three major hardwoods, clothing and embroidery, make students appreciate modern art,The training room for the creation of brokerage cultural and creative products has initially developed a high level of recognition and feeling for the charm of "old flavor". Among the "good" uses, it has the "au

notes: 限 10 人

description.zh: 使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

notes: 科研 243

description.zh: 企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。本課程將介紹：1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理 2、企業與客戶間的客戶倫理 3、企業與同業間的競爭倫理 4、企業與股東間的股東倫理 5、企業與社會間的社會責任 6、企業與政府間的政商倫理。
description.en: Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 1. Ethics between employer and employee 2. Ethics between enterprise and client 3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor 4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder 5. Ethics between enterprise and society 6. Ethics between enterprise and government.

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1. 知識發現與資料探勘概論 2. 資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3. 資料處理技術 4. 教導型學習方法 5. 教導型學習方法 6. 關聯法則探勘 7. 資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.

notes: 科研 240

description.zh: 課程會涵蓋資訊能力與財金的整合來協助學生了解 FINTEC 服務。接下來透過設計思考來帶領學生透過設計一服務創新主題，讓學生以學習到的方法工具，進行實地演練，透過發表與評價，體驗完整的創新旅程，同時建立分組的創新作品集。
description.en: The course develops practical approaches for understanding and analyzing the servie of financial technologies (FinTech). The course will use design thinking to take students through the design of the User Experience (UX) and User-Interface (UI) of a product or service of their creation.

name.zh: 金融科技與服務創新流程

notes: 資財三、四甲乙和資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程將由個人資料保護原則開始對個人資料保護作全面性的介紹，並說明《個人資料保護法》與《個人資料保護法施行細則》如何與個資保護原則互相呼應，期使學生瞭解目前個人資料保護的管理議題與實務考量，並且說明可參考的標準與指引，以強化學生對於個人資料保護的基礎概念。藉由《個人資料保護法》及《個人資料保護法施行細則》的介紹帶入 ISO/IEC 29100 的個資保護框架、隱私衝擊評鑑 (PIA)，接下介紹 ISO/IEC 27701 個資保護實作指引等相關國際標準，本課程以實際的案例以及國際標準讓學生這對於個人資料保護有更進一步的概念與瞭解。
description.en: This course will begin with a comprehensive introduction to personal data protection principles and explain in detail the "Personal Data Protection Act" and the "Enforcement Rules of the Personal Data Protection Act". Student will learn managerial and practical considerations of personal data protection. Relevant standards and guidelines, such as ISO/IEC 29100, ISO/IEC 27701, will be discussed to strengthen students' understanding of fundamental concepts of personal information management systems (PIMS). In addition, the process of a privacy impact assessment (PIA) and its related standard ISO/IEC 29134 will also be introduced in this course. All in all, this course aims to give students a solid understanding of personal data protection through cases studies and international standards.

notes: 資財三、四甲和資財所合開 / 科研 240

description.zh: 本課程介紹資金管理的理論與實務應用。如何判斷一個交易系統好壞，使其不斷產生利潤？我們將從理論出發，套用在實務交易模擬上，包含單一策略、多商品、多市場、多策略的運用。本課程將以 R 語言搭配模擬。
description.en: This course introduces the theory and practice of money management. How to determine a trading system is good or bad, how to continues to generate profits in a trading system? We will start from the theory, applied to the simulation of real trading market, including single strategy, multi-commodities, multi-markets, multi-strategies. This course will be run with R language.

notes: 科研 243

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and approaches, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

notes: 請排六教 526 (e), 限本系生，修課上限 21 人

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by wo

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (II)

notes: 請排一般教室，限本系生，修課上限 21 人

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 請排 PBL 教室，限 20 人，日碩 & 設計博 & 資工系合開

description.zh: 介紹高動態範圍影像相關技術與理論基礎，包含高動態範圍攝影，物理運算彩現，色調映射，影像光源等數位軟硬體操作。並透過討論引導學生如何在高動態範圍影像技術所建立的數位環境中，發展設計與研究的應用。
description.en: Technologically, this course introduces the related digital technologies of High Dynamic Range Imaging. Including High Dynamic Range Photography, Physically Based Rendering, Tone mapping, and Image Based Lighting. Intellectually, this course aims to explore the possibilities of utilizing the related technologies of High Dynamic Range Imaging on design and research applications.

notes: 限 12 人，日碩 & 外碩 & 設計博合開

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面以感知真實的角度循序討論數位呈現的相關技術。在研究理論方面則介紹相關之現有研究、研究工具、與研究方法，並討論與人互動之感知研究的理論與操作，心理物理學的實驗設計與受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: This course introduces research methods applicable in the field of design with particular emphasize on the human interaction. Topics including Psychophysics, perceptual study, HCI experiment design, hypothesis testing, and statistical analysis. The aim of this course is to help students in identifying a research topic in the field of interaction design, designing an experiment, and preparing the necessary documents including research proposal and consent form to recruit human subjects to participate in the experiment.

notes: 限 12 人，日碩 & 外碩 & 設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹聲音設計與電子音樂的製作技巧，透過介紹音訊編輯的技術、相關聲音設計工具的使用，學習創意的聲音設計與電子音樂製作。課程當中，除了聲音設計的工具介紹之外，並教導學生使用 Ableton Live 序列器軟體，搭配 Max for Live 的聲音設計工具，讓使用者可以在序列器中使用自己所設計的軟體合成器與數位位效果器，進而可延伸至多媒體、遊戲、新媒體展演等之音樂與音效應用。
description.en: This course mainly introduces sound design and electronic music production tools and skills. Through the introduction of audio editing technology and the use of related sound design tools, students can learn creative sound design. In the course, students are taught to use the Ableton Live sequencer software, combined with its sound design tools in Max for Live, to design their own software synthesizers and digital effects to be used in the sequencer. These skills may be used in multimedia design, game audio, new media performances, and etc.

notes: 請排三教 206 室，限 20 人，學生自備筆電 & 耳機，日職合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 請排進修部教室 (三教 506), 限 30 人修，日職合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case study, workshop, group discussion, seminars, mechanical engineering and automation in modern Industries.

notes: 機電博、機電外生、機械自動化、能源與車輛及博外生合

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 本課程專門設置了兩個主要的構面，課程規劃著重於培育未來之企業領導與管理人才與而設置。全球化的競爭使得各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，高階主管面臨 "兩難" 甚至 "多難" 的多元選擇情況下，企業目標與經濟決策時常產生衝突，” 倫理” 的議題因此成為當今高階管理之重要課題之一！ 再者，本課程第二個構面為策略管理，透過教導策略目標的擬定、執行、組織結構以及如何因應組織內外部環境的轉變能帶給 IMBA 課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，同時，配合個案，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與併購和多角化議題等方面相關管理能力之建構。
description.en: More than ever, business leaders are facing even more challenges in the turbulence environment, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects. Two important parts are introduced in IMBA program, which is business ethics and strategic management. The purpose in this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains. How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. Moreover, the topic in strategic management integrates cutting-edge research on topics including competitive advantage, corporate governance, diversification, strategic leadership, technology and innovation, and corporate social responsibility through both theory and case studies. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the st

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis. St

notes: IMBA&IMFI,Computer Room

description.zh: 智慧手機、智慧車、智慧家電、智慧電網、智慧化控制系統等，一場科技革命正熱鬧展開。看似單一產品的創新，背後其實有著更大的驅動力，那就是當行動通訊與網際網路結合後，催生出來的 Mobile Internet 新領域，所有資料都上網、所有物品都連網、所有人都掛網，個人到企業都必須做好準備。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解行動運算的應用，與跨入 3G 最新手機開發平台，培養未來開發手機程式設計之技術實力，使學生具備獨立開發手機應用程式的能力。
description.en: This is an introduction course of mobile computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of mobile technology; and applications, 2. Location-based service 3. Could-based computing 4. Mobile applications; 5. Mobile programming

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 管理博班 & 資財所，Computer Room【停開】

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 管理博班

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by wo

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (II)

notes: 限本系生修課，限 12 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 互動外生和技職所合開，限 15 人

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 製科所和博電博班合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

notes: 機電博、機電外生、機械自動化、能源與車輛及博外生合

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博一選課，請依分組 & 共同討論上課時間

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一。孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二。家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三。醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四。日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 日、職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: First grade

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

notes: 綜科思源 417

description.zh: 1.Core 的特性分析 2.Choke 設計 3. 高頻變壓器設計 4.Core 的特性實習 5.Choke 實習 6. 高頻變壓器實習
description.en: 1.Analysis of core2.Design of choke3.High frequency transformer design4.Practice of core,choke and high frequency transformer

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink 簡介 2. 控制系統建模 3. 線性時變控制系統分析 4. 可觀測性與可控制性 5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析 6. 曲線擬合與系統建模 7. 控制器設計 8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構，能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在 Hadoop 生態系統中，以 Cloudera Hadoop 為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop 硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹 Hadoop 認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.

notes: ◎日、職電機所和電資外生所合開 / PBL 或視教 1 樓

description.zh: 瞭解 CMOS 超大型積體電路之電路元件特性及其組合電路之分析與設計方法，其內容包含：金氧半電晶體電路特性分析、電路性能評估、電路模擬、組合電路設計、序向電路設計、設計方法分析、測試與驗證、CMOS 案例討論與 Verilog HDL 設計等課程內容。
description.en: This course covers the electric specification, circuit analyses, and design methods of the CMOS VLSI. The contents of this course include: Circuit characterization, performance estimation, Circuit simulation, Combinational circuit, Sequential circuit, Design methodology, Testing and verification, CMOS case study, and Verilog HDL design.

description.zh: 1. 智慧型控制系統簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）系統 2-1 類神經網路基礎 2-2 類神經網路應用及實習 3. 模糊邏輯控制系統 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用及實習 4. 基因演算法 4-1 基因演算法基礎 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用及實習
description.en: English Description: 1. Introduction of artificial intelligence control system 2. Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1. 能源成本控制    2. 區域型電力能管理策略    3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: (1) 物聯網概述，(2) 物聯網感知層，(3) 物聯網網路層，(4) 物聯網應用層，(5) 物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6) 無線感測網路 802.15.4 與 ZigBee，(7) 無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID 原理與應用，(9) WSNs 至 IoT，(10) 近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

description.zh: 1. 解析法 2. 變分法 3. 動差法 4. 有限元素法 5. 譜域分析法 6. 傳輸線矩陣法
description.en: 1.Analytical Method 2.Variational Method 3.Moment Method 4.Finite 5.Spectral Domain Analysis 6.Transmission Line Matrix

notes: ◎電子所日職合開

description.zh: 1. 網路協定、2. 消息理論和資料壓縮與視訊標準、3. 錯誤更正碼：迴旋碼渦輪碼低密度同位檢查碼 BCH/RS 碼、4. 無線視訊傳輸的抗錯、5. 跨層資源分配、6. 無線區域網路、7. 隨意網路和感測網路、8. 無線個人 / 大都會 / 體域 / 網狀網路、9. 物聯網等最新發展
description.en: 1. Network protocols 2. Information theory, source coding and Video standards 3. channel coding: convolutional codes/turbo codes/LDPC codes/BCH/RS codes 4. Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線理論 2. 等量傳輸網路之合成 3. 集體元件微波電路 4. 半集總濾波電路之合成 5. 耦合傳輸線之物理參數 6. 耦合傳輸線濾波器 7. 指狀濾波器 8. 梳型濾波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line theory2.Synthesis of commensurate line networks3.Lumped element microwave circuits4.Synthesis of semi-lumped filter curcuits5.Physical parameters of coupled lines6.Coupled lines filter7.Interdigital filter8.Combline filter

description.zh: 1. 固體結晶結構 2. 能隙與載子 3. 載子傳輸 4. 過量載子 5. P-N 接面 6. 金半接面及半導體異質接面 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 8. 雙極電晶體
description.en: 1. Crystal Structure of Solids2. Energy Bands and Charge Carriers3. Carrier Transport4. Excess Carriers5. P-N Junctions6. Metal-Semiconductor and Semiconductor Heterojunstions7. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field Effect Transistor (MOSFET)8. Bipolar Transistor

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 本課程將以 BIM 之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討 BIM 之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解 BIM 建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個 BIM 相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM 程式撰寫，BIM 系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
description.en: This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

notes: 日、職車輛所、能源與車輛外生、機電博班和能源所合開

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論，線性規劃法，非線性規劃法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規劃法介紹，精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

notes: 日、職車輛所、能源所、機電博班、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一) 儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二) 儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

notes: 【停開】

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩一

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

notes: 共同 302

description.zh: 教學內容包含：學術倫理、教師專業倫理、學校行政倫理、校務研究倫理、評鑑倫理、資訊倫理與科技倫理、及其他新興倫理議題。課程實施方法以講解、專題演講、專題討論及情境問題解決為主。研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育領域倫理相關重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題提出簡報，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，並提出心得報告於課堂中研討，或撰寫探究議題之相關學術論述，以發展研究能力。
description.en: The contents of this course include: academic ethics, professional ethics for teachers , administrative ethics, institutional research ethics, evaluation ethics, information ethics and ethics in technology as well as other emerging issues on ethics.Lecturing, keynote speeches, seminars, and situation problem solutions are the means to be conducted in class. Students can report on sub-issues  in current ethics-related fields in technological and vocational education, investigating and implementing small-scale study, reviewing and proposing related topics, or writing academic papers, for the purpose to develop strong research skills and abilities.

name.zh: 技職教育倫理專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on the Ethics of Technological and Vocational Education

notes: 日夜合開，共同 303A

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

notes: 日夜合開，共同 302

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

notes: 共同 302

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

notes: 共同 302

description.zh: （一）瞭解生涯規劃與經營的理論及實務；（二）探討生涯規劃與經營模式；（三）應用生涯規劃與經營模式。課程內容包括：生涯規劃與生涯管理的定義、內涵與功能、生涯探究指引、生涯目標設定、生涯策略、生涯評估、生涯管理議題、人力資源支持系統及組織生涯管理系統。
description.en: The course arms to (1) Understand the theory and application Of career planning and management. (2) Explore the model of career planning and management. (3) Apply the career planning and management model. It covers the definition, essence, and function of career planning and management, a guide to career exploration, career goal setting, career strategies, career appraisal, and contemporary issues in career management, human resource support system, and organizational career management system.

name.en: Career Planning and Management for Employees

notes: 共同 302

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

notes: 日夜合開

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

notes: 共同 303A

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 限本所學生

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 班級經營

notes: 共同 303A

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎 (a) 輸送現象 (b) 高分子黏彈學 (c) 高分子混煉。(II) 高分子加工學之應用 (a) 壓模法 (b) 沖模法 (c) 反應沖模法 (d) 絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray 等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子？電路成像高分子？光電子成像材料？最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB 薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 課程從統計模式 (迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en: The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

notes: 建築三、建築四與職建都所合開

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

notes: 日、職建都所合開

description.zh: 面臨我國高齡化社會的趨勢下，老人與環境的議題急待重視。在觀察老人與環境互動的過程中，需將老人的生活空間經驗置入於生活變遷、社會關係及文化脈絡的向度中來討論。本課程是綜合心理學、心理學、社會學、建築與都市規劃等多面向學科來探討老人的身心特性及老年生活環境之需求。
description.en: Facing a trend toward the aging society, the issue about the elderly and environment is supposed to be valued. In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

notes: 日、職建都所、博班合開
