name.en: Interdisciplinary Design and Development of Creative Products

notes: 訓四設一二、日職碩合開；碩人數上限各 7；設計 106

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間) 運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

notes: 日、職車輛所、車輛四合開

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 日、職車輛所、能源所、機電博及能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: 日、職車輛所、能源與車輛外生和能源所合開

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo 未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未 來社會也將會給給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 限 12 人，日碩 & 外碩 & 設計博合開

description.zh: 虛擬實境是一種藝術與科技的整合，廣泛運用在不同屬性的領域，如飛行模擬器、醫療檢測設備、成品預覽等。本虛擬實境應用之課程內容，將專注於虛擬實境應用對於未來科技、生活等不同層面的影響，同時探討沈浸、想像、互動與人類心理認知的相互關係。課程內容包含幾何式虛擬實境、影像式虛擬實境、混合式虛擬實境等。
description.en: Virtual reality (VR) is an integration of art and technology. It is widely used in fields that are very different in nature such as aviation simulator, medical inspection equipment, preview of finished products, etc. This course will focus on the impact of VR application in the future technology and lifestyles as well as explore the relationships among engrossment, imagination, interaction, and human psychological cognition. The course content includes graphic-based VR, imaged-based VR, and hybrid VR.

notes: 限本系生，上限 12 人，日 / 職碩 & 外碩 & 設計博合開

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面上討論與人互動之設計領域研究的理論與操作。在研究理論方面則介紹人機互動相關之研究工具、研究方法、人機互動實驗設計、統計與假說驗證，以及受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: Technologically, this course reviews the recent developments on research-based interaction design. Theoretically, this course introduces the theories and methodologies of the research applications in the field of human-computer interaction and teaches how to design a HCI experiment.

notes: 請排光華 409 室，限 12 人，日職合開，限論文研究組修

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的規劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告製作可如何掌握、發揮互動式媒體的特性，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程亦教導同學如何應用電腦影像（computer imaging）與多媒體的科技與技術，來製作互動式廣告。
description.en: This course is mainly about the planning and principles of interactive advertisement production such as features of interactive media, how can advertisement production control and develop the features of interactive media, as well as the related concepts, technology, and skills needed in order to build, design, develop, and maintain interactive advertisement. Students will learn how to use computer imaging and the technology and techniques of multi-media to make an interactive advertisement.

notes: 請排進修部教室，限本系生修，限 15 人，日 / 職碩合開

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。
description.en: Design leadership means to design and to lead-to lead design and to lead business by design. Today, those responsible for design creation face leadership challenges and opportunities greater than ever before. Who should lead design? Who leads by design? How and why does a company "lead with design?" Design leadership has many interpretations, ranging from inspiration to collaboration and from culture to globalization. Design leadership is a commercial imperative. It creates differentiation, sustains competitive advantage, and enables world-class performance that is sustainable into the future.This course will provide the insight and interaction essential to utilizing design leadership for business success. Vision and strategy are the critical elements of leadership. It covers the strategy and the effects of inspiring design leadership and the personal characteristics and attributes of great design leaders.

notes: 設計博核心選修

description.zh: 本課程專為研究生所設計，提供機器人全方位之分析與應用，課程主題如下所示：1.         空間描述與座標轉換 2.         機械手臂運動學 3.         機械手臂反向運動學 4.         賈氏矩陣：速度與靜力 5.         機械手臂動力學 6.         軌跡規劃 7.         機械手臂控制 8.         機器視覺 9.         工業自動化應用 10.      實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制註：大四生須經授課教師同意方可選修。
description.en: This course is designed for graduate students and will provide a solid analytical and practical experience on a variety of aspects in robotics. Topics in the course are as follows.1.         Spatial descriptions and transformations 2.         Manipulation kinematics3.         Inverse manipulator kinematics4.         Jacobians: velocities and static forces5.         Manipulator dynamics6.         Trajectory generation7.         Control of manipulators8.         Machine vision9.         Industrial automation applications10.      Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robotsSenior undergraduate students are allowed to take this course in case they are approved by the instructor.

name.zh: 高等機器人與自動化應用

notes: * 電機所、自動化所、電資外生所和機械自動化合開

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面上討論與人互動之設計領域研究的理論與操作。在研究理論方面則介紹人機互動相關之研究工具、研究方法、人機互動實驗設計、統計與假說驗證，以及受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: Technologically, this course reviews the recent developments on research-based interaction design. Theoretically, this course introduces the theories and methodologies of the research applications in the field of human-computer interaction and teaches how to design a HCI experiment.

notes: 請排光華 409 室，限 7 人，日職合開，限論文研究組修

description.zh: 虛擬實境是一種藝術與科技的整合，廣泛運用在不同屬性的領域，如飛行模擬器、醫療檢測設備、成品預覽等。本虛擬實境應用之課程內容，將專注於虛擬實境應用對於未來科技、生活等不同層面的影響，同時探討沈浸、想像、互動與人類心理認知的相互關係。課程內容包含幾何式虛擬實境、影像式虛擬實境、混合式虛擬實境等。
description.en: Virtual reality (VR) is an integration of art and technology. It is widely used in fields that are very different in nature such as aviation simulator, medical inspection equipment, preview of finished products, etc. This course will focus on the impact of VR application in the future technology and lifestyles as well as explore the relationships among engrossment, imagination, interaction, and human psychological cognition. The course content includes graphic-based VR, imaged-based VR, and hybrid VR.

notes: 請排光華 402 室，限 12 人，日碩 & 職碩 & 外碩 & 設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的理論、企劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告專案製作之掌握、發揮互動式媒體特性的方法，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程透過課堂中關於互動式廣告原理的講授、相關的個案研究以及文獻導讀使學生能具備互動式廣告之企劃與研究分析能力。學生評量方式包含報告繳交以及分組討論與發表。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theory, planning and techniques of interactive advertisement, which includes the characteristics of interactive media, project management of advertisement, techniques of developing the interactive media, and the way to construct, design, create and maintain the interactive advertisement. The course is preceded by means of lecturing related theory, case studies and literature review to allow students to be capable of interactive advertisement planning and analysis. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 請排進修部教室，限本系生修，上限 15 人，日職合開

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 雙號

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

notes: 博二

description.zh: 本課程屬於影像處理的進階課程，將聚焦於多光譜和高光譜影像分析與處理，並將涵蓋一般日常使用的彩色影像（多光譜影像的一種），以遙測影像與醫學影像作為主軸，分析各自不同的差異，以及所需的影像處理技術。課程內容將涵蓋多光譜和高光譜影像的基礎、各種影像於分析時所面臨的挑戰以及所需的影像處理技術，包括線性分解、資料降維與升維、光譜與空間上的特徵萃取、機器與深度學習演算法。選修本課程的學生需要具備基礎的信號處理、機率、線性代數和影像處理方面的背景。本課程將於學期初復習重要的基本概念，協助選修同學銜接本課程。
description.en: This is an advanced course on image processing. The main focus of this course is the analysis and processing of multispectral and hyperspectral images. It will cover the general color images as a type of multispectral image and be mainly based on remote sensing and medical images for analysis of their differences and corresponding image processing techniques.The scope of this course includesfundamentals of multispectral and hyperspectral imagery, challenges in image analysis, and corresponding image processing techniques, such as linear unmixing, dimensionality reduction, spectral and spatial feature extraction, and machine/deep learning algorithms. Studentsare expected to have a basic background in signal processing,  probability, linear algebra, and image processing prior to taking this course. Important basic concepts will be reviewed at the beginning of the semester to help students lay the groundwork.

notes: ◎電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 錯誤控制技術是推動現代行動通訊超大量傳輸、超高可靠度與超低延遲等特性的重要技術之一。本課程旨在介紹現代無線行動通訊之錯誤控制技術之設計原理與應用，內容涵蓋：(1) 無線行動通訊技術之錯誤控制技術簡介 (2) 基礎通道編碼理論與通道容量之介紹 (3) 渦輪碼之原理與設計 (4) 低密度校驗矩陣碼之原理與設計 (5) 極化碼之原理與法設計 (6) 混合式自動重送請求技術之原理與設計。
description.en: Error control technology is one of the key enablers for boosting the strict performance of modern mobile communication systems (e.g., extremely-high data rate/reliability and ultra-low latency). This course aims at helping students acquire the knowledge about the applications and design principles of the error control techniques adopted in modern mobile communication systems, covering: (1) Introduction to error control techniques for mobile communication systems, (2) Introduction to basic channel coding theory and channel capacity, (3) Principles and designs of turbo codes, (4) Principles and designs of low-density parity-check (LDPC) codes, (5) Principles and design of polar codes, and (6) Principles and design of hybrid automatic retransmission requests (HARQ) technologies.

name.zh: 現代行動通訊錯誤控制技術
name.en: Error Control Technologies for Modern Mobile Communication Systems

notes: ◎電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要針對電力電子與其相關應用進行探討，內容著重於電能轉換技術、現代化科技與新世代產品之結合。課程主題如下: (1) 電能處理簡介 (2) 基本電力轉換器 (3) 回授控制器設計 (4) 太陽能電池特性 (5) 最大功率追蹤技術 (6) 電池特性與充放電技術 (7) 逆變器電路與技術 (8) 再生能源發電系統 (9) 電動車驅動系統
description.en: This course focuses on the Power Electronic technologies and related applications. The combination of the electrical energy conversion techniques, modern technologies and next generation products will be included. Main topics of this course are as follows: (1) Introduction of Electrical Energy Processing (2) Basic Power Converters(3) Feedback Controller Design(4) Solar Cell Characteristics (5) Maximum Power Point Tracking(6) Battery Characteristics and Charging/Discharging Technologies(7) Inverter Circuits and Technologies(8) Renewable Energy Generation System(9) Driving System of Electric Vehicles

notes: ◎電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

notes: ◎電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介 2. 隨機程序 3. 數位調變與多工技術 4. 最佳接收器 5. 載波與符碼同步 6. 消息理論 7. 訊源編碼 8. 通道編碼 9. 展頻通訊系統 10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

notes: ◎電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 藉由模擬實習，使學生學習與驗證■發展變頻器所需具備的技術，包含變頻驅動感應向量控制、變頻器脈波寬度調變、直接轉矩控制及多階變頻器。■變頻器所引起的問題與相關解決方案。
description.en: To understand and confirm■the techniques required for the development of inverter, including modeling, simulation, PWM control, vector control, direct torque control, multilevel inverter control by simulation.■some problems and the related solutions for inverter.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

notes: 日職合開 / 限 20 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

notes: 日職合開 / 星期六 234 節 / 限 20 人，三教 309

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

notes: 核心七選二

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡：包括物質本性，化學熱力學，化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化：包括化學反應速率與動力學，分子反應動力學，表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

notes: 核心七選二，0 週【停開】

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 本課程將以問題導向學習 (Problem-based Learning) 的模式，學習設計思考的五個核心步驟：同理心分析、問題定義、創意發想、雛型發展、驗證評估。並透過實際案例的分析與操作，學習互動設計跨領域創新的方法。本課程的主要目標在於提供學生：1. 了解互動設計的方法與步驟；2. 探討互動設計跨領域創新的方法與操作模式；3. 透過實務案例的操作累積互動設計的執行經驗。
description.en: This course will use Problem-based Learning (PBL) method to teach the five kernel steps of design thinking including the following: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, and Test. It will also help students in knowing the interdisciplinary innovation methods of interaction design by case studies and real case operation. The main course goals include the following: gain an understanding of the methods and steps of interaction design; explore the methods and operation models for the interdisciplinary innovation of interaction design; and gain the experiences of interaction design by real cases analysis and operation.

notes: 請排一般教室，限 15 人，日碩 & 外碩 & 設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程是動態影像的進階課程，不以歷史性發展為課程目的，旨在探究各類影像涉及的感官經驗以及所屬的文化意義，包含藝術電影、紀錄片、實驗電影與數位影像等，進而說明以動態經驗為基礎的混合現象，其涉及的美學、文化、技術與當代性。閱讀文本涵蓋電影、媒體與視覺文化評論。
description.en: This advanced moving images course aims to exam sensory experiences and cultural significances of various cinematic forms from art cinema, documentaries, and experimental images to the digital turn of VR films and beyond. However, the goal of the course is not to be a historical survey but instead an investigation of this hybrid moment and its relationship to aesthetics, culture, technology, and modernity. Readings cover topics in film theory, media theory, and visual cultural critical theory.

name.en: Theory and Praxis in Moving Images

notes: 限 10 人

description.zh: 1. 基本觀念，2.RC 主動網路之元件與子網路，3. 具有零元件及任意元件的主動網路分析，4. 雙極接面電晶體之線性應用，5. 運算放大器之線性應用，6. 網路靈敏度，7. 分解，結構，及靈敏度，8. 二階濾波電路之合成與設計，9. 梯形濾波電路之合成與設計，10. 信號流程圖之濾波電路之合成與設計
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts, 2.Elements and Sub-networks of RC-Active Networks, 3.Analysis of Active Networks using Nullors, 4.The Bipolar-Junction Transistor and Linear Applications, 5.The Operational Amplifier and Linear Circuit Applications, 6.Network Sensitivity, 7.Decomposition, Structures, and Sensitivity,8.Biquadratic Filter Synthesis and Design, 9.Ladder Filter Synthesis and Design, 10.Filter Design using Signal-Flow Graph Simulation

name.zh: RC 主動電路之分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of RC-Active Circuits

description.zh: 1. 概論 2. 鐵路變電所設計 3. 電力遙控系統 4. 電車線系統設計 5. 干擾與防護 6. 動力車的電力供應 7. 動力車的電力控制 8. 未來發展
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Railway substation design3. Power remote control system4. Catenary system design5. interference and protection6. Power supply of locomotive7. Power control of locomotive8. Future development

notes: ◎No foreign student is admitted to this class.

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 電力系統簡介 3. MATLAB 簡介 4. 電力潮流分析 5. 最佳化調度 6. 電力系統故障之研究 7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 機電所、製科所和自動化所合開 / 限 50 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 機電所和製科所合開 / 限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：精實製造工程。介紹最新精實製造系統和實務工具，主題包括： 1. 精實製造系統概論 2. 價值溪流分析 3. 快速更換 4. 使用點 5. 源流品質 6. 團隊 7. 全員生產維護 8. 後拉式 / 及時 / 看板生產系統 9. 單元小組製造
description.en: Introduction to modern issues in lean manufacturing systems and practice of lean tools. Topics include overview of lean manufacturing systems, value stream analysis, quick changeover (QCO), point of use storage (POU), quality at the source, teams, total productive maintenance, pull/just-in-time/Kanban, and cellular manufacturing.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一，和機電博、機械外生合開 / 限 26 人 /

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電博及機械外生和能源車輛專班合開

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2. 雷射基本原理  3. 各種雷射介紹  4. 雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

notes: 限 50 人

description.zh: 微加工程序含 MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含 MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 硬體簡介、影像處理 (單色、彩色、3D 及即時)、圖案識別 (Patten Recognition)、機械視覺於順序控制之應用、機械視覺於回授控制之應用、高速檢測、機械人與機械視覺之結合及應用。
description.en: Introduction to Hardware of Vision System, Image Processing (Monochrome, Color, 3D and real-time), Pattern Recognition, Application of MV to Sequential Control Application of MV to Feedback Control. High Speed Inspection, Combined Applications of Robotics and MV.

notes: 計中教室 / 限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制、電氣控制、數值控制、幾何數據處理、驅動系統、適應控制系統、監視系統與診斷系統、機器人控制、電腦整合精密機械系統。
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, and Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 限 21 人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 限 30 人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
description.en: Applied linguistics is a large interdisciplinary field of study related to a range of academic fields, including linguistics, psychology, education, anthropology, and sociology. This course focuses primarily on research in the areas of second/foreign language acquisition, second/foreign language pedagogy, discourse analysis, and sociopragmatic and sociocultural theory, as well as their relevance to language teaching and learning. We will cover theories and applications from a variety of perspectives, tracing the history of methodologies with special emphasis on those currently in widespread use.

description.zh: 傳統發音教學大多根據教師直覺認為語音是該如何產製的、或發音課本中教條式的規則。在這堂課，學生將透過具體的聲學和構音資料、來學習重要語音學原則，並學習將原則正確地應用在發音教學當中。學生也將探討如何將這些知識轉化成不同年齡層和語言程度之學生可以接受的內容。
description.en: Traditionally, pronunciation teaching has been based on "armchair data" (e.g., the instructor's intuition on how a sound should be articulated) or prescriptive statements in pronunciation textbooks. In this course, students will learn fundamental principles of phonetics through experimental acoustic and articulatory data and learn how to apply them to pronunciation teaching. Students will be challenged to translate what they have learned to digestible pronunciation instructions for students of different ages and proficiency levels.

name.zh: 語音學和英語發音教學

description.zh: 多媒體翻譯乃專題導向學習的課程，兼顧理論與實務。學生將習得多媒體翻譯的多種面向。本課程第一部分，學生所學習之多媒體翻譯文本涵蓋臉書、TED 和維基百科等界面的翻譯，並認識網路字幕組翻譯與遊戲翻譯的特性與策略。課程第二部分，學生逐步建立對影視翻譯的認知，並持續研究及演練數位串流影音等相關文本的字幕翻譯，瞭解翻譯、語言與文化的連結。專題導向學習的翻譯實作，讓學生掌握新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，藉此協助學生與時俱進，構思適切的翻譯策略。本課程的工作語言是中文與英文。
description.en: This project-based course aims to familiarize students with the various theoretical and practical dimensions of multimedia translation. In the first half of the course, students are introduced to translation of multimedia texts on Facebook, TED and Wikipedia as well as the practice of fansubbing and video game translation. In the second half of the course, students gain increased awareness of audiovisual translation and continue with their theoretical and practical exploration in the subtitling of streaming and digital media texts both linguistically and culturally. Students’ performance and management of project-based tasks assist them in keeping abreast with the new trends and formulating appropriate translation strategies. Note that the working languages of this course are Chinese and English.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 超音波技術簡介 2. 基礎彈性力學 3. 彈性動力學 4. 平面波 5. 平面波的反射 6. 平面波的折射 7. 表面波 8. 藍姆波 (平板波) 9. 超音波於非破壞檢測之應用 10. 超音波於材料性質量測之應用 11. 超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用 12. 超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用 13. 超音波於加工應用之應用
description.en: 1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining

notes: 製科所必選課程之一 / 限 30 人 / 全英文

description.zh: 許多文學鉅作都已經被改編成電影，讓以英語作為第二語言的學生能夠更容易地體驗這些具有文化意義的故事，一些全新且獨特的流行文化娛樂，像是電影、電視、音樂、舞蹈、和電玩遊戲也從其他文學作品和作家得到啟發。這門課程將透析文學和流行文化如何以有趣且富含文化意義的方式做結合，課程中會展現流行文化如何讓學生對這些好的文學作品更加熟悉，以及文學知識如何使學生更懂得欣賞且了解這些他們樂在其中的流行文化。
description.en: Many of the greatest works of literature have been adapted into films, making it easier for ESL students to experience those culturally significant stories.  Other literary works and writers have inspired entirely new and different pop cultural creations (film, tv, music, dance, video games).  This course examines how literature and pop culture have combined in interesting and culturally significant ways. The course demonstrates how pop culture can help students become more familiar with great works of literature, and how knowledge of literature can help students better appreciate and better understand the popular culture which they enjoy.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

notes: 限 24 人

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用 3D 繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

notes: 綜科 802 / 星期四 ABC / 限 24 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。類神經網路介紹：演算法，應用，與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合，近似推理理論，模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

notes: 機電所、機電博及機械外生和能源車輛專班合開 / 限 50 人 /

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開 / 限 22 人

description.zh: 本課程將對英語文教學之趨勢與議題進行深入探討與分析，課程內容包含一般英語文 (EGP) 及專業英語文 (ESP) 之教學法、課程設計與英語教學實踐研究、全英語授課 (EMI)、學科內容與語言整合教學 (CLIL)、雙語教育及師資培育等相關議題。本課程在培養學生具有英語文教學與研究之理論基礎、研究設計及創新課程推動之應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of current and emerging issues and trends in English as a foreign language (EFL) teaching and research. Both teaching English for general purposes (EGP) and specific purposes (ESP) will be addressed regarding methods and techniques in implementing courses and teaching practice research. The issues related to bilingual education will also be discussed, including English as a medium of instruction (EMI), content and language integrated learning (CLIL), and bilingual teacher development. The course will provide theoretical foundations and applications in respect to research and innovations in teaching EFL across different education levels.

name.zh: 語言教學趨勢專題研討
name.en: Seminar on ELT Trends and Issues

description.zh: 塑性加工概論、金屬變形機構、冷作加工、鈑金成形理論、塑性加工產品檢驗、塑性加工機械與模具、個案討論。

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 影像簡介， 2. 顏色空間， 3. 類比影像介面， 4. 數位影像介面， 5. 數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9. 數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: ◎電子四、所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 在過去的 60 年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

description.zh: 本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，包含：有線及無線網路的內容介紹，以及整合有線及無線網路成為異質網路的概念，其中將針對 IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH) 教導學生針對異質網路垂直切換的原理及技術。最後，對於多媒體服務技術及原理做介紹，包含：VoIP 服務以及視訊串流服務的介紹，以及如何針對 多種異質網路整合多媒體服務的介紹，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。
description.en: This course introduces the characteristics and architecture of multimedia service in heterogeneous network environment. First, wired and wireless networks, e.g., 3G/3.5G/4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and other popular wireless access techniques, would be introduced one by one. Then, by describing the theory and technology of IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH), this course would show how to integrate multiple different networks into heterogeneous network environments and how to handoff among them. Finally, regarding multimedia service, VoIP and video streaming services would be taken into consideration. This course would introduce how to provide multimedia services over heterogeneous network environment. Therefore, students can learn the next-generation techniques about multimedia services in heterogeneous network environment from this course.

name.en: Multimedia Service in Heterogeneous Network Environment

description.zh: 1. 台灣海域的地質概述，2. 海域的工程地質調查，3. 不同環境下的風場結構，4. 海流特性的調查與評估，5. 波浪特性的調查與評估，6. 鋼結構施工，7. 風機之運輸與安裝，8. 灌漿工程，9. 離岸變電站與基礎，10. 風機葉片之製作、安裝、維護與維修 11. 海纜鋪設工程 12. 構材防蝕技術 13. 沖刷防治 14 基樁鑽掘與噪音降檢
description.en: 1. Offshore geology description nearby Taiwan, 2. Offshore geotechnical site investigation, 3. Wind farm structures under different environmental conditions, 4. Investigation and evaluation of current properties, 5. Investigation and evaluation of wave properties, 6. Construction of steel structure, 7. Transportation and installation of wind turbines, 8. Grouting engineering, 9. Offshore substation and foundation , 10. Fabrication, installation, maintenance and repair of wind turbine blades, 11. Laying procedures of subsea power cables, 12. Corrosion-proof technologies, 13. Scouring-proof technologies, 14 Pile drilling and noise reduction

name.zh: 離岸風機工程調查與施工
name.en: Engineering investigation and construction for offshore wind turbines

notes: 大學部、防災所和工程學院合開 (限研究生選修 30 人)

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering,including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering.  Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of thefrequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field.  In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization anderosion control.  An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized.  The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems.  No prerequisite.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

notes: 土木四甲乙 & 防災所合開 (研究所上限 14 人) 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 工程進度規劃與控制是營建工程進行專案管理時之重要知識與技術，此課程包含 ADM 及 PDM 網圖、要徑分析、PERT 分析、趕工計畫、及實獲值分析等理論知識，同時也會結合工程進度控管軟體應用技術。本課程目標意在培養同學具備工程進度規劃與控制觀念知識，並透過專案練習及軟體操作讓同學具備工程進度規劃與控制能力。
description.en: Construction project scheduling and control is necessary and important for effective management of construction projects. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for construction project schedule scheduling and control. The course includes plan and analysis of ADM and PDM networks, analysis of critical paths,, plan for catch-up, introduction of PERT and earned value analysis methods. The course will teach students the major concept and methods of construction project scheduling and control. Furthermore, the course will enhance students abilities and techniques integrated with project practices and project schedule software uses.

notes: 管理組必選

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測 (溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測 (水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線) 及地下水 (土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

notes: 日、職建都所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在強化有關都市土地使用規劃與成長管理的理論與經驗，以及增進對都市整體建成環境未來的瞭解。因此，本課程將藉由對都市土地使用規劃與成長管理經驗特有與一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、都市成長對土地的需求。 二、土地使用管制與倫理。三、都市變遷與規劃。四、都市成長管理與政府的角色。 五、達到都市成長管理的可能途徑。 六、都市成長管理體系內的必要措施：例如環境、交通運輸、住宅、財政、風險、信託、組織等。 七、結論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with urban land use planning and growth management, and the struggle to define the collective future of our built environment. By identifying unique as well as common issues, problems, and innovations in urban growth management experiences, our hope is to improve planning practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Land needs for urban growth. 2. Land use control and ethics. 3. Urban change and planning. 4.Growth management and the role of government. 5. Alternative approaches to growth management. 6. Balancing planning needs in growth management systems: environmental, transportation, housing, financing, risk, trust and organization concerns. 7. Conclusions

name.zh: 都市土地使用計畫與成長管理
name.en: Urban Land Use Planning and Growth Management

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧，正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 資源所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
description.en: The course aims to advance students' knowledge of the physics underlying different applied geophysical methods and how the methods are used for exploration, geotechnics, and characterization.  We will cover the theories and modeling techniques of seismic refraction, seismic reflection, heat flow, gravity, and magnetics methods.

description.zh: 1. 電子光學簡介 2. 穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3. 電子擾繞射理論 4. 電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法 5. 掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種近代材料分析技術，特別著重於表面分析上。修課後，學生將了解各種技術的基本原理並可選擇適當的方法去作樣品影像表面以及材料分析，同時可比較各方法優缺以及其限制。課程討論之技術主要基於樣品與光子或電子之間的交互作用。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce modern techniques for materials characterization, especially on surface characterization. After completing the course, the students would be able to understand and choose appropriate instrumentation for imaging and materials analysis by comparing the performance and limitation of different methods for a given situation. Techniques involved in photon and electron interactions with matter would be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

notes: 限碩二修讀

description.zh: 當 Lumiere 兄弟於 1895 年末在巴黎一家咖啡館，舉辦第一場售票的電影放映會時，也正是全球第二次工業革命如火如荼影響人們的生產方式與都市生活之際，透過紀錄當代都市活動與工業化機械美學的短片，他們讓電影技術與城市發展從最初就密不可分，共同作為歌頌現代性的重要媒介。然而，學術界要遲到約莫百年之後，從 1990 年代開始才逐漸形成專門探討電影與城市互動關係的跨學門領域。來自電影研究、都市研究、地理學、歷史學、比較文學、區域研究？？等等領域的學者們，於過去三十數年間替電影城市研究貢獻心力。他們不只是藉由電影分析與相關史料爬梳來重新理解現代性、現代主義與當代都市的發展，也同時關注於二次大戰後流行的黑色電影 (film noir) 如何將當時的都市議題作為其創作主題，後續於 1970 年代起流行的各種近未來反烏托邦電影，又是怎麼進一步藉由預測人類都市的發展來反思當下，創造電影與城市間更為複雜的互文關係。千禧年之後，隨著電影工業與市場的全球化，電影逐漸成為具有都市行銷潛力的大眾媒體，電影場景更逐步發展成一個重要的觀光類型。同時因為電影技術門檻降低與社群媒體的發展，電影也不再只是電影公司或具有天份的獨立電影工作者的遊戲，更多難以分類的影像對都市空間進
description.en: While cinema has been invented over a hundred years and getting influential in shaping people’s perspectives to our environments, the studies of cinematic urbanism have only initiated since 1990s. During the past decades, this interdisciplinary field has developed upon the scholarships of various disciplines, including film and media studies, cultural studies, history, geography, urban studies, etc. This course intends to introduce this still young field through chronologically examining the relationships between cinema and cities, from both being used to celebrate and mediate the modern feelings,to film noir playing a crucial role to criticize and depict urban problems, and to cinematic urban imaginaries boosting tourism and intervening in urban process. Students will learn the theories and methodologies of cinematic urbanism studies, comprehending cinema and different urban spaces as powerful medium that could be manipulated to create, transmit, and perceive certain ideologies.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

notes: 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程，其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

notes: 能源所和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能、單相系統、可用能分析、多相系統、動力廠、冷凍、熱力最佳化、不可逆熱力學。
description.en: The contents of this course include the first law of thermodynamics, the second law of thermodynamics, the two laws combined in analysis: the destruction of exergy, single-phase systems, exergy analysis, multiphase systems, refrigeration, thermodynamic optimization, and irreversible thermodynamics.

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋討論光電學之基本應用原理並結合分子生物學之知識 （諸如 脫氧核糖核酸核糖核酸 蛋白質 或細胞的基本結構介紹） 希望能更拓展學員對光電學應用的眼界 本課程目標將藉由了解光電探測儀器之操作應用，光源控制，與光源種類之差異（諸如 gamma 射線，X - 射線，UV 光，紅外線與可見光), 進而將之應用於生物分子的觀察，與生命科學應用上，範圍之廣無可界限.
description.en: This course covers optoelectronics combine with biomolecular of knowledge. We will focus on discussing how the DNA, RNA, protein or cells related with optoelectronic application. Optoelectronics is the study and application of electronic devices that source, detect and control light, usually considered a subfield of photonics. The light often includes invisible forms of radiation such as gamma rays, X-rays, ultraviolet and infrared, in addition to visible light, which is based on the quantum mechanical effects of light on semiconducting materials. A biomolecule is any organic molecule that is produced by a living organism, including large polymeric molecules such as proteins, polysaccharides, and nucleic acids as well as small molecules such as primary metabolites, secondary metabolites, and natural products. As organic molecules, biomolecules consist primarily of carbon and hydrogen, nitrogen, and oxygen, and, to a smaller extent, phosphorus and sulfur.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 高分所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 半導體構裝技術是將積體電路和其它電元件，依設計聯結在一系統中，再以構裝材料將晶片、基座及釘架封包。本課程將介紹陶瓷構裝和高分子構裝、及其相關技術、與工業現況。
description.en: Semiconductor packaging is to allow the chips be incorporated into an individual protective package, mounted with other components in hybrid or multichip modules, or connected directly onto a printed circuit board. This course will introduce both ceramic packaging and polymer packaging and their corresponding technology.

notes: 網路預選限 15 人；化工所生化所合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在建立學生於醫學工程領域相關之知識。課程將為學生建立從小至基礎分子生物理論到大至人體以期具備生物相關領域之基礎知識，接續搭配基礎光電理論的建立並探討其應用於醫學工程相關領域之儀器及設備，內容亦因應時事而帶入課程討論，以期學生能對於醫學工程領域有更深一層之了解。此課程將以概論之方式進行，歡迎對此領域有興趣之同學學習。
description.en: Students taking this course will develop fundamental knowledge in the biomedical engineering field. Students will increase knowledge in biology and photoelectronics. The related equipment and apparatus applied in the biomedical engineering field will de be introduced. The course will also include current news to the students for expanding their knowledge in the biomedical engineering field. This course is an introductory course. The students who are interested in this field are welcomed to attend this course.

name.en: The Technology and Application of Biophotonics

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電博及機械外生專班合開 / 限 25 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構，鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係，是一門實務性，基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性，塑性行為，差排理論，單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形，複合材料，高溫聚晶材料之變形，非晶質材料之永久變形，材料強化機構，材料破壞，潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電博及機械外生、能源車輛專班合開

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬 - 陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電博、及機械外生、能源車輛專班合

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開 / 限 50 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman 構圖法，反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary 方程式，Bobillier 構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein 方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

notes: 限 50 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

notes: 博士班

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

notes: 限 50 人

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論，線性規劃法，非線性規劃法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規劃法介紹，精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

notes: 日、職車輛所、能源所、機電博班、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹光電半導體的基本原理與應用，幫助同學們了解光電元件如發光二極體的製程、封裝、及測試技術的發展，由市場應用概況導入，含蓋設計研發、製造生產、與特性量測等範疇，說明光電元件的光熱電特性對元件效率的影響，並搭配實驗方式深入了解。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles and applications of optoelectronic semiconductors such as light emitting diodes to help students understand the fabrication process, packaging, and test technologies This course includes application, design and manufacturing. In addition, the influences of optical, thermal, and electrical properties on the device efficiency will be explained through fundamental theory and experiments.

name.zh: 光電半導體元件技術及應用
name.en: Optoelectronic semiconductor device technology and application

notes: 機電所和製科所合開 / 限 21 人

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 限博士班修習，製科所和博電博班合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班修習，製科所和機電博專題討論合開

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

notes: 博班必修

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意一維系統的自由及強制振動多維系統的自由及強制振動自然頻率的計算與模態分析振動的控制振動量測與應用振動系統之數值分析方法非線性振動機構與動力傳動元件的振動分析
description.en: Free and Forced vibrations of Single Degree of Freedom Systems, Free and Forced vibrations of Multi-degree of Freedom Systems,  Determination of Natural Frequencies and Mode Shapes, Vibration Control, Vibration Measurement and Applications, Numerical Methods in Vibration Analysis, Non-liner Vibration, Vibration Analysis of Mechanisms and Power Transmission Elements.

notes: 限 21 人【停開】

description.zh: 此課程包含以下主題：(1) 直流馬達、伺服馬達、及永磁交流馬達的建模、控制系統設計與模擬，(2) 馬達速度及位置觀測器設計與模擬，(3) 數位控制及驅動器設計與模擬。
description.en: The contents of this course include: (1) Modeling, control system design, and simulation of DC motor, servo motor and permanent magnet synchronous motor. (2) Motor speed and position estimator design and simulation. (3) Digital control and driver design and simulation.

name.zh: 電機控制系統設計與模擬
name.en: Design and Simulation of Electric Machine Control Systems

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用 Python 深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：? 車牌與門牌數字辨識？人臉辨識？1000 種影像分類？辨識 9000 種物件？自動駕駛模擬？嵌入式深度學習演算法？空虛，寂寞，覺得冷？讓深度學習來幫助你:? 遞迴式神經網路 (RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人？對抗生成網路 (GAN)：用 GAN 產生自己的夢中情人？深度強化學習 (DRL)：訓練 AI 跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

notes: ◎電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時，大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解施工安全衛生的重要，熟悉有關知識及緊急措施，從而增加處變之因應能力。內容包括施工安全衛生組織，事故調查分析，風險評估與安全管理，施工安全和衛生設備，安全經費編列與執行，新穎的風險評估及安全管理方法與研究等。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the students the concept of the importance of construction safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of construction safety, analysis of accidents, risk assessment and safety management, construction safety and facilities, safety outlay and implementation, current research and novel techniques for risk assessment and safety management and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩一

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博二

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 課程與教學

notes: 共同 303A

description.zh: 本課程檢視受到廣泛使用的主要教育評鑑模式，並熟悉教育評鑑模式的取向與實用技術。
description.en: This course is designed to review the most widely used model for educational evaluation, to conversant with approach and utility technique of evaluation models.

notes: 博碩課程

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 高分所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的在於教授都市設計的基本分析理論與方法，除透過課堂案例的介紹與討論外，學生還將以分組方式進行觀察研究與運算分析。案例介紹與討論之重點在於認識影響都市空間環境品質的關鍵要素，而分組研究之目的則在於讓學生藉由各種現場觀察與數位分析工具的應用，進一步探索這些關鍵要素在都市空間形構過程的交互影響過程。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to key theoretical and methodological approaches in urban design. The main content will be delivered through a series of case study discussion and project-based research practice. In specific, the case study is to review and identify key factors shaping the physical environment of cities; while through collaborative research projects, students are expected to engage in a step-by-step process of on-site observation and computational analysis, examining how the factors are interacting with each other.

notes: 建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 面臨我國高齡化社會的趨勢下，老人與環境的議題急待重視。在觀察老人與環境互動的過程中，需將老人的生活空間經驗置入於生活變遷、社會關係及文化脈絡的向度中來討論。本課程是綜合心理學、心理學、社會學、建築與都市規劃等多面向學科來探討老人的身心特性及老年生活環境之需求。
description.en: Facing a trend toward the aging society, the issue about the elderly and environment is supposed to be valued. In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

notes: 日、職建都所與設計博合開 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性 (de-terrorization) 的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施 (infrastructure) 的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性 (alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的 "實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分：全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築 / 地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
description.en: In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

name.zh: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
name.en: Rethinking urban social infrastructure in contemporary cities

notes: 建築四、建都所合開

description.zh: 臺灣建築史的發展大約可分成受到漢民族影響的傳統建築，以及日本和西方世界影響的近現代建築，本課程主要探究臺灣近現代建築發展的歷程。本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣近現代建築分為三個主題：(1) 臺灣近現代建築的背景、(2) 臺灣殖民時期、(3) 二次大戰之後的臺灣建築。
description.en: This course mainly discusses the development of modern Taiwanese architecture since the Japanese colonial period. The historical development of Taiwanese architecture could be divided into traditional Han architecture and modern architecture with Japanese and western influences. Based on the timeline, three themes will be introduced: (1) the background of Taiwanese modern architecture, (2) Taiwanese architecture during the colonial period, (3) Taiwanese architecture after the Second World War.

notes: 建築四、建都所合開

description.zh: 現代性源自於歐洲獨有的歷史文化與社會，在工業化、理性化和民主化的推波助瀾下綻放開來，促使人們從神話、威權和中心性解放出來，擺脫傳統社會的制約。透過現代性的反證精神和批判性概念，歐洲幾乎於整個二十世紀初開展出驚人的物質和人類意識的進程。而建築的生產與整個社會、經濟、政治和審美價值緊密相關的專業，又是如何以自身作為對於現代性的批判？本課程將以辨明現代性概念為主軸，透過阿道夫・魯斯 (Adolf Loos)、西格弗里德・吉迪恩 (Sigfried Giedion)、華特・班雅明 (Walter Benjamin)、恩斯特・布洛赫 (Ernst Bloch)、和威尼斯學派 (Venice School) 的論說作為理解現代性含混而艱澀的觀念，並藉由藝術和建築作品的探索，作為對於現代性的批判與理念的參照，包括前衛派藝術對於建築的衝擊、新巴比倫的城市景觀社會反論、建築的擬仿和批判等等。
description.en: The term “Modernity” originated from the unique European history, culture, and societal condition, bloomed with the development of industrialization, rationalization and democratization. That have inspired human to liberate from mythology, authority and centrality, and get rid of the constraints of traditional society. With the antithesis and critical concepts of modernity, Europe has carried out an amazing progress of material and human consciousness almost throughout the twentieth century. How does architecture as a profession closely related to the entire society, economy, politics, and aesthetic approach, in the process of production implemented itself as a critique of modernity?    In the beginning of the class, it would be most important to identify the concepts of Modernity. The discourses of Adolf Loos, Sigfried Giedion, Walter Benjamin, Ernst Bloch, and the Venetian School help to clarify the vague and difficult concepts of modernity. Through the exploration of art and arc

name.zh: 現代性與建築名作研討
name.en: Seminar on Modernity and Architecture Masterpiece

notes: 建都所、設計博班合開

description.zh: 本課程從建築物構築方法和材料特性出發，介紹構法的歷史以及創新應用。內容包括現行工法的運用，以及先進工法的突破。藉由課程引導和案例介紹，培養學生構法知識與應用能力，提升學理與實務上的知能。
description.en: This course starts from building construction methods, introduces the technical history, innovative applications of construction methods. The content includes the application of current construction methods, as well as the breakthrough of advanced construction. Through course guidance and case study, students will cultivate their knowledge of construction method, and enhance their ability in academic theory and practice.

name.zh: 傳統與未來的建築構法

notes: 建都所、設計博班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

notes: 限 30 人

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: Made computer the power of problem solving, intelligent behavior and storage type, comprehension and distinguish abilities. The abilities of vision, hearing, touching, learning, identifying, analyzing are also the target of the course.

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 工管所 & 管理博班 & 資財所

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 經管所 & 資財所

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis.

notes: IMBA&IMFI & 工管所 & 管理博班，Computer Room

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1. 潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹 (Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓 (Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓 (Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池 (Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池 (Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池 (Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池 (Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加 (Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與？浦 (Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送 (Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析 (Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

notes: 機電所、機械外生和能源車輛專班合開 / 需有白板教室 / 限

description.zh: 智慧製造意旨透過資通訊及數位技術（例如數位控制、智慧機器人、自動光學檢測、雲端運算、人工智慧與物聯網等）的輔助，讓生產系統更具智慧，減少生產成本、提升產品品質與增加客戶滿意。本課程透過問題導向學習 (PBL) 方法，引導學生學習關於智慧製造之核心技術。
description.en: English description：The objective of smart manufacturing is to reduce manufacturing cost using information and communication technology, including digital control, industrial Robotics, automated inspection, cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and internet of thing (IOT). This course provides introduction of smart manufacturing and hands on practice about collaborative robot (Cobot) and manufacturing execution system (MES) operation under the framework of problem-based learning (PBL) model.

name.zh: 智慧製造 PBL 專題
name.en: Problem Based Learning, special topics in Smart Manufacturing

notes: 學 25 碩 10 合開

description.zh: 本課程聚焦於進化計算方法、模擬退火法、遺傳演算法、蟻群優化法和粒子群優化等啟發式演算法之介紹，以及演算法於經典最佳化問題之應用，並以管理科學之實務案例討論演算法之應用。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction to heuristic and metaheuristic algorithms, including Evolutionary Computation, Simulated Annealing (SA), Genetic Algorithm (GA), Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) and Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), and their application in well-known optimization problems. Case studies for a variety of problems will also be discussed.

notes: 工管所和管理博班合開

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，遠距的商機迅速崛起。在後疫情時代，人們的行為模式改變了，接受訊息的渠道幾乎都轉移到網路上，而商業行為自然也必須更新行銷手段，於是數位行銷（ Digital Marketing ）應勢而生。電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。數位化的網路電子商務已經成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。
description.en: After the Cov-19, digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

notes: 工管四甲乙丙、工管所和管理博合開，計中教室

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在學習隨機最佳化方法在生產與服務系統的理論與應用，以解決不確定環境下的實務問題。課程內容包括：(1) 隨機最佳化基本概念與應用、(2) 二階段隨機規劃模型、(3) 多階段隨機規劃模型、(4) 隨機規劃演算法、(5) 穩健最佳化模型、(6) 模擬最佳化演算法、(7) 強化學習演算法、(8) 隨機最佳化應用論文導讀。
description.en: This course will introduce the stochastic optimization theory and learn its application on production and service systems under uncertainties. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of stochastic optimization, (2) Two-stage stochastic programming model, (3) Multi-stage stochastic model, (4) Stochastic programming algorithms, (5) Robust optimization model, (6) Simulation optimization algorithms, (7) Reinforcement learning algorithms, (8) Paper readings on stochastic optimization.

notes: 工管所和管理博班合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹計算智慧的相關知識、技術與其優點，旨在教授學生如何運用計算智慧技術解決實際問題。課程目標有二：(1) 相關的計算智慧技術與其運作原理，包含：遺傳演算法、多目標遺傳演算法等；(2) 相關的應用案例討論。透過此課程，學生將可套用計算智慧技術於各種最佳化問題。
description.en: This course will introduce related knowledge, techniques and merits of computational intelligence for providing useful ways for students to solve the real application problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related computational intelligence techniques and how it work, including genetic algorithms, multi-objective genetic algorithm, etc; (2) related applications and discussions. Through this course, students can learn how to apply computational intelligence on different optimization problems.

notes: 科研 243

description.zh: 本課程專注在創業管理的基礎以及前瞻面向，以理論、實務、產業分析以及個案討論做為課程內容。創業課程在全球視野上涵蓋了科技性以及廣泛性的討論，其許多論點對於策略管理亦有重要的意涵。本課程將提供學生務實的方法引導未來創業所需的基礎以及營運新創事業的必要認知。期盼本課程中學生可以進行創業思考，了解創意與創業的執行方法，進而培育未來成功的創業家。
description.en: This course focuses on the fundamental and advanced aspects of management of start-up with theories, practices, industry analyses, and case studies. It is consciously designed with a technological and global outlook since this orientation in many ways highlights the significant emerging trends in strategic management.
