The course is intended to provide the students with a pragmatic approach that will guide the formulation and implementation of start up a high-tech business. Students are expected to think and behave with creativity and execution capability as successful entrepreneurs after the trainings from this course.

notes: IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 廣告策略與企畫為廣告之進階課程，學生需結合行銷，廣告，創意，消費者心理及行為等領域之知識，並具備優秀之企畫能力，為所指定之企業，產品或理念規畫完整之整合行銷傳播企畫案。
description.en: nternational Advertising and Media Strategy takes a market-oriented approach to the total campaign. The course interrelates planning, creative and technical skills with emphasis on problem-solving and marketing communications.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹基於神經網路的深度學習技術及其在商情預測上之應用， 主要內容包括：（1）深度學習和神經網路的基本概念和演算法；（2）深度學習的主流結構、啟動函數及正則化技術；（3）電腦視覺與自然語言處理技術應用案例；（4）深度學習主流結構的商情預測應用。通過課程的學習，同學們可瞭解神經網路基本概念；掌握深度學習中主要網路結構的基本概念和相關演算法；瞭解具體應用領域的背景知識；應用相關深度學習技術於商情預測。
description.en: This course will give a full picture of deep learning techniques and its application in business forecasting. Content includes: (1) basic concepts and algorithms of deep learning and neural networks; (2) popular network structures, activation functions, and regularization techniques; (3) principle and applications of computer vision and natural language processing. (4) applications of popular network structures in business forecasting. By learning this course, students will consolidate the basic concepts of neural networks; master the basic concepts and related algorithms of the main network structure in deep learning; understand the background knowledge of deep learning techniques with specific application fields; and understanding how to apply the main network structure in business forecasting.

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性與消費者行為相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。課程主要以個案討論方式進行。
description.en: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性與消費者行為相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。課程主要以個案討論方式進行。

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創新服務設計能力，融合服務設計觀點完成服務藍圖。其中著重於智慧聯網應用場域所可能涵蓋的各類產品及其服務設計之學習與實作達成本課程之學習目標。課程中透過智慧聯網科技趨勢等智慧聯網服務與應用內涵、智慧化情境發想、關係人洞察、產品服務藍圖、可行性分析、產品概念設計、營運計畫書規劃等系統化流程與方法，搭配國內外指標案例解析及實務案例，使學生瞭解創新智慧化服務設計的內涵，具備規劃服務設計的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to develop students' innovative service design capabilities and integrate service design perspectives to complete the service blueprint. It focuses on the learning and implementation of the various products and service designs that may be covered by the Smart Connected Application Domain to achieve the learning objectives of this course.In the course, through the networked services such as smart networking technology trends and application connotation, intelligent situational thinking, relationship insight, product service blueprint, feasibility analysis, product concept design, operational plan planning and other systematic processes and methods, with Domestic and international indicators case analysis and practical cases enable students to understand the connotation of innovative and intelligent service design and have the ability to plan service design.

name.en: The Special Topics on Innovation and Service Design

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

name.zh: 創業講座 — 創業是一場馬拉松
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- The persistance that makes the great entrepreneur

notes: 創創與經管所合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討企業面對數位轉型衝擊下，其商業模式勢必要有所調整。其中商業模式在數位化下如何規劃與運作，以及其中如何將數據運用與融入營運機制是其重要課題。因此，課程中除了基本數位商業模式與數據驅動營運之基礎概念與其對應之理論講授外之外，為增進學生對其實務應用了解，相關之產業個案亦作探討。
description.en: This course aims to explore the need for adjustments in the business model of enterprises facing the impact of digital transformation. Among them, how to plan and operate the business model under digitalization, and how to use and integrate data into the operating mechanism is an important topic. Therefore, in addition to basic digital business models and basic concepts of tree-residential-driven operations and their corresponding theoretical lectures, the course also explores industrial cases in order to enhance students’ understanding of practical applications.

name.zh: 數據驅動營運與創新商模專題研究
name.en: Research on data-driven operation and innovative business models

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討企業面對數位轉型衝擊下，其商業模式勢必要有所調整。其中商業模式在數位化下如何規劃與運作，以及其中如何將數據運用與融入營運機制是其重要課題。因此，課程中除了基本數位商業模式與數據驅動營運之基礎概念與其對應之理論講授外之外，為增進學生對其實務應用了解，相關之產業個案亦會探討。
description.en: This course aims to explore the need for adjustments in the business model of enterprises facing the impact of digital transformation. Among them, how to plan and operate the business model under digitalization, and how to use and integrate data into the operating mechanism is an important topic. Therefore, in addition to basic digital business models and basic concepts of tree-residential-driven operations and their corresponding theoretical lectures, the course also explores industrial cases in order to enhance students’ understanding of practical applications.

name.zh: 數據驅動營運與 創新商模專題研
name.en: Research on data-driven operation and innovative business models

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術 (元件、電路、方法) 之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書 (含申請專利範圍) 撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論之後專利答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in class.

name.en: Practice in electrical engineering technology patent application

notes: 電機四甲乙丙和智財所合開

description.zh: 高階光學鏡頭是目前探索太空、發展醫療及曝光設備極為重要的關鍵技術，此技術可應用到生活各項領域，包括：拍照攝影、星空宇宙探索、智慧監控及商用鏡頭 (望遠鏡、相機和顯微鏡) 等。本課程主要授課內容針對工程背景學生跨領域選修，以瞭解奈米級精度系統設計、製造、檢測、組裝及驗證。為使學習效果顯著成效，除了以講授方式闡述重要基礎觀念外，選修學生將實際製作產品及最終上台報告，使課程學以致用為本課程最大宗旨。
description.en: High-end optical lenses are leading edge technology for the medicine, semiconductor, mobile phone, surveillance, machine vision, and space industry. This course will teach students how to design optical systems, transform those designs into real optical components, and test them. All the selected students in this course are required to report their results on the stage in the final examination.

name.zh: 光機電系統概論與實務製造
name.en: Introduction to optical electromechanical system and manufacturing technology

notes: * 光電大研和電資外生所合開

description.zh: (1) 雷射基本概念 (2) 電磁場與物質交互作用 (3) 物質能階結構 (4) 光在介質中的傳播 (5) 光學共振腔 (6) 泵浦過程 (7) 穩態雷射性質 (8) 瞬態雷射性質 (含 Q - 開關及鎖模等) (9) 雷射系統 (氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10) 雷射的應用 (1) 雷射基本概念 (2) 電磁場與物質交互作用 (3) 物質能階結構 (4) 光在介質中的傳播 (5) 光學共振腔 (6) 泵浦過程 (7) 穩態雷射性質 (8) 瞬態雷射性質 (含 Q - 開關及鎖模等) (9) 雷射系統 (氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10) 雷射的應用
description.en: (1)Introductory concepts (2)Interaction of radiation with matters (3)Energy levels in materials (4)Propagation of light through media (5)Optical resonators (6)Pumping processes (7)Continuous wave laser behavior (8)Transient laser behavior (9)Various lasers (10)Laser applications

notes: ◎ 光電三四所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

notes: ◎ 光電所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 西方文化的交流是建立在故事上的。即使這些故事相當久遠，但每個人卻都非常熟悉，又或者是因為這些故事相當久遠，所以每個人都非常熟悉。本課程將探討近代主要西方作家 — 喬瑟及莎士比亞 — 作品中的核心主題及文化的意象。研讀這些近代西方主要作家的作品是發展西方文學素養及思想的基石，同時，也為任何概括了以西方文化為主體的研究提供了不可或缺的背景知識。
description.en: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories. Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old stories. This course introduces students to some of the stories that have been most influential in the English-speaking world. Knowing these stories provides essential background knowledge for understanding Western culture in general.

description.zh: 本課程介紹科技論文寫作與報告，課程內容包括科技論文寫作元素介紹 (摘要、介紹、方法、結果、討論、結論) 與撰寫方式，文獻搜尋與整理，報告與發表注意事項，以利環境所碩博士生應用於未來論文撰寫與成果發表。
description.en: This class focuses on the Introduction of major elements in technical writing, including abstract, introduction, research methods, results, discussion, and conclusion. Writing grammar, style, and methods to perform literature search and review are also introduced. The main aim of this course is enhancing the ability of graduate students in future thesis writing and research publication.

notes: 【停開】

description.zh: 先修課程：統計學基礎統計介紹、一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、隨機化區集法、拉丁方格法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor, two-factor, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized block design, Latin square, and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開 / 限 20 人

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在探討及分析各種先進通訊技術，相關領域包括新世代無線通訊、電信網路、多媒體訊號處理等
description.en: This course aims to explore and analyze various advanced communication technologies related to areas of new generation wireless .communications, telecommunication networks, and multimedia signal processing, and so on.

name.en: Advanced special topics on communication engineering

notes: ◎電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   1. 簡介 2. 數位影像處理基礎 3. 影像的轉換 4. 影像的增強 5. 影像的復原 6. 影像的壓縮 7. 影像的分割   8. 影像的表達及描述 9. 醫學影像的處理和應用 10. 利用雷射光做 3D 電腦視覺
description.en: 1.Introdution  2.Principles of digital image processing   3.Image transformation 4.Image enhancement 5.Image restoration 6.Image compression 7.Image partition 8.Image description 9.Medical image and applications 10.3D computer vision based on laser

notes: ◎  Digital Image Processin

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

notes: 限 21 人

description.zh: 分子生物學主要藉由分子的方法來探討細胞的生成、組成、功能及相互間之作用。因此此課程會含概以下四大部分：1. 細胞之簡介 2. 分子基因學 3. 細胞之內部組成 4. 細胞間之生長，交互作用之影響
description.en: The course is designed to teach upper level graduate students about the recent advances in protein science and glycobiology with specific Molecular Biology is chiefly concentrated with eucaryotic cells and its title reflects the prime importance of the insights that have come from the molecular approach. This course will cover the following four different parts.1. Introduction to the cell2. Molecular genetics3. Internal organization of the cell4. Cells in their social context.

notes: 分子四和高分所合開

description.zh: 蛋白質與醣類科學課程是為進階研究所學生所設計的。這堂課的目標是在教導學生蛋白質科學和醣類科學最近的發展，以具體應用在醫療和生物科技產業為例子。學生必需要先修以下的課程： 一般有機化學， 生化， 蛋白質結構和醣質科學基礎科學。學生將預計學習蛋白質與醣類之結構， 蛋白質與醣類之生物合成，相關之具生物活性之醫療和生物科技蛋白質和多醣類。
description.en: The course is designed to teach upper level graduate students about the recent advances in protein science and glycobiology with specific application in medical and biotechnological industries. The prerequisite classes for this course are: general organic chemistry, biochemistry, protein structure and glycobiology. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive protein and glycconjugates.

notes: 分子四和高分所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

notes: 機電所和機械自動化外生班合開，限 50 人 /(三) ABC

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學？高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin 理論、Flory-Krigbaum 理論、相分離、θ- 溫度、滲透壓、GPC 測分子量、高分子膠體。? 高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括：(1) 黏彈性簡介 (2) 時間溫度轉換 (3) 非結晶區之玻璃轉移點 (4) 橡膠理論 (5) 黏彈模型 (6) 介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程沿續「積體電路製程先進技術與設備」課程，介紹半導體世代機台開發與製程應用、關鍵元件設計概念與應用，著重科學基礎知識如何應用在半導體產業。
description.en: As an extension of “Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing” course, this course focuses on how the scientific knowledge is connected and applied to the real development of tools and introduces the evolution of the design and application of semiconductor tools and key components.

name.zh: 半導體尖端設備與關鍵元件
name.en: Semiconductor advanced equipment and key components

notes: 曾釋鋒老師 / 限 40 人 / 先鋒大樓 403 教室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念 2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式 3. 形狀函數及等參數元素 4. 一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等 5. 二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題：一般實體 7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理 8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用 9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

notes: 限 25 人 / 陳政順老師 (兼任)

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

notes: 機電所、機電博及機械自動化外生班合開，計中教室

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: ◎ 博士必修，碩士選修不計畢業學分，老師腳不便請排 1

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

notes: 共同 302

description.zh: 1. 光纖感測介紹，2. 光纖感測元件，3. 光纖感測系統，4. 光纖感測多工技術，5. 光纖雷射感測系統，6. 長距離光纖感測系統，7. 大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8. 光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-2 班 碩一 自 109 級起必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與 EMBA 學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發 EMBA 學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二 自 109 級起必修 台北上課，國際會議廳

description.zh: 現代人工作壓力大，許多上班族都有壓力、失眠、焦慮等問題。醫學也發現，身體許多疾病甚至癌症也都和情緒、壓力有關。目前，已經證實正念減壓：可以降低壓力與焦慮，疲勞，降低員工的職業倦怠程度和離職率。提升睡眠品質，增強孼疫系統，提升專注力，提高領導效能，提升大腦功能與創造力，促進幸福感。滿意度，情緒管理能力、創造力、與人際溝通能力，提高工作績效。改善了個人健康、工作與家庭生活！因此，目前歐美和國內的各大企業紛紛引入正念課程，以提高員工和企業績效。
description.en: There are so many people with the high stress in the workplace. It’s demonstrated that practicing mindfulness can bring improvements in both physical and psychological symptoms as well as positive changes in health, attitudes, and behaviors. The advantages of integrating mindfulness in the workplace including:higher brain functioning;reduced work-related stress, anxiety, depression, fatigue, and psychological distress .Improves job performance, greater job satisfaction, and decreasing turnover and burnout.

name.en: Mindfulness for Leadership and Stress Reduction

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理 / 陳德中、張振興

description.zh: 1. 學習診斷輔導方法 2. 培養學生現場診斷與輔導 3. 提升學生企業經營管理改善能力
description.en: 1. Learn diagnostic counseling methods2. Train students on-site diagnosis and counseling3. Enhance students' ability to improve business management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理 (聯輔會) 修畢企業管理 & 經營策略實務

description.zh: 本課內容包括高分子鏈之統計力學、高分子之界面作用力及 Flory-Huggin 理論。 對於紡織技術學程的規劃，本課程會注重紡織纖維的合成技術，例如用奈米技術加在 Nylon 纖維上，例如以 clay 加強 Nylon 的強度及磨耗性質，用理論的探討例如用 Halpin-Tsai equation 去預測紡織纖維的楊氏係數，另外也會加強高分子物理化學在紡織纖維成型過程中所扮演的角色。
description.en: The course includes; statistics of polymer chain, interfacial polymer force, Florry-Huggun theory. A major objective of this course is to provide a background in polymerizations, polymer structures and polymer properties. The material in this course also covers polymer characterization, polymer rheology and polymer processing. In addition, structures, properties, usages and products of rubbers, plastics and fibers are emphasized and compared. The object of this course is also to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties.

notes: 分子四和高分所合開

description.zh: 本課程探討的主題包括：電子商務的定義與架構、市場商機分析與風險評估、電子商務的經營模式及其對傳統經營模式造成的衝擊、顧客界面規劃設計、網路行銷與品牌塑造、實作導入、線上交易機制與資訊安全以及電子商務發展趨勢等相關議題，作深入淺出的探討。並以案例研討方式，加強學生理解，以達到最佳的學習效果。
description.en: This course mainly includes the following topics: 1.Overview of EC; 2.The opportunity and risk evaluation; 3.The business models of EC and impact on traditional businesses. 4. User interface planning; 5.The marketing strategies of EC; 6.How to install an EC; 7.Online transaction mechanisms and information security etc. Some real-world cases will also be discussed to enhance students' understanding and obtain the best learning effects.

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

notes: (群組 4) 行銷管理

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

notes: (群組 5) 創新與創業管理

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理

description.zh: 如英文概述內容所述。
description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 如英文概述內容所述。
description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括：最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的 loop shaping 及 loop transfer recovery 技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統 (可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

notes: ◎控制組新聘

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解世界地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of the World architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

notes: 日、職建都所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目的除了逐一介紹勞資關係各種常用方法之外，並針對每一方法提供了豐富的各種勞動法規應用範例，期望同學在修習完畢後，不僅了解勞動法規的主要方法，更重要的是讓同學藉由這些工具學習解決企業勞資關係問題的能力，對創造企業的競爭優勢有所認識。
description.en: This curriculum main goal besides introduced one by one the Industrial Relations each commonly used method, and aimed at each method to provide the rich each kind of Labor Laws, expected the schoolmate after repaired the custom to finish, not only the understanding Industrial Relations main method, more importantly let the schoolmate affiliation by these tool study solution enterprise Industrial Relations questions abilities, to create the enterprise the competitive advantage to have the understanding.

description.zh: 本課程將延續財務工程導論的內容，將持續在衍生性商品評價、避險以及風險控管等問題上繼續深入探討；本學期將把焦點放在股票衍生性商品與利率衍生性商品的評價與避險上，並利用 C (或 C++) 和 Matlab 兩種工具來執行 (1) 樹狀結構 (2) 蒙地卡羅法 以評價選擇權的價值。
description.en: This course will still focus on the methods for derivatives pricing and hedging, such as the evaluation of stock and interest rate options. For implementation purposes associated with the concepts introduced, such as the tree structure and Monte Carlo simulation, two programming languages for computation will be provided: C (or C++ ) and Matlab.

notes: 科研 240

description.zh: 本課程探討的內容涵蓋國際金融基本觀念、架構、理論與應用，課程內容包括：匯率、外匯市場 (即期、遠期、外匯期貨和外匯選擇權市場)、國際收支與國際貨幣制度、國際收支調整理論和均衡匯率決定理論等。同時討論國際金融環境的變化、多國籍企業如何規避匯率風險、開放經濟下的總體經濟政策等議題。此門課的修習除了有助於了解國際金融相關知識外，並可以培養對國際金融與匯兌問題之思考、探討、批判與洞察能力。
description.en: This course provides the introduction to the workings of the foreign exchange markets, the impact of economic policy on exchange rates, the nature of foreign exchange risk, and the effects of various international economic policies on domestic and world welfare. The course content will include balance of payments, determination of foreign exchange rates, and international monetary system, and cover the following topics: foreign exchange market; the interest rate parity theorem; exchange rates and inflation; purchasing power parity; balance of payments and national income accounting; the determination of the exchange rate.  In addition, we focus on how multinational corporations manage their exchange rate risk, and how they make sound investment and financing decisions factoring exchange rate fluctuations.

description.zh: 本課程欲利用人工智慧技術實作量化交易系統。於課程中會參考研讀多篇國外相關文獻，討論後將其實作，並於期末結合技術報告作為成果發表。本課程建議先行修過演算法交易、資金管理、以及人工智慧或機器學習相關課程，並有基本程式語言能力。
description.en: This course intends to use artificial intelligence technology to implement a quantitative trading system. During the course, many relevant academic paper will be studied and discussed, and implemented after discussion. Finally, the technical report will be published as the result at the end of the semester. This course is recommended to take pre-courses in algorithmic trading, money management, and artificial intelligence or machine learning, and have basic programming language skills.

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解世界地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of the World architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

notes: 日、職建都所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 企業創新與研究是促成經營策略成功之不可或缺的部分。資通訊科技日新月益。現今資訊科技系統已成為企業中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹使用更新進的資訊科技所促成的企業創新。
description.en: Business innovation and research are integral components of business strategy and success. The information & communication technologies (ICTs) advance rapidly. Now, the information technology system has become an essential part of enterprises. The goal of the course is breadth to cover advances in ICTs, with emphasis on enabling business innovation.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.zh: 創業 0 到 2 的思維與實作

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各 20 位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

notes: 55 人教室

description.zh: 本課程的目的是幫助學生發展創新和創業思維能力。本課程是以美國巴布森學院的創新創業課程為基礎。它使學生能夠快速了解創業所需的知識和技能，例如創業思維方式，自我理解，人際網絡，商業模式等能力。並在跨領域雙師的指導下，學習跨領域設計思考和溝通技巧的核心概念。我們希望本課程可以培訓新時代的跨學通才，並提高他們的競爭力。此課程為未來進入職涯架構接軌機制，也為產業注入強而有力的新能量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to help students to develop innovation and entrepreneurial thinking ability. The course is based on the entrepreneurship program courses from Babson College in the United States. It allows students to quickly understand the knowledge and skills needed for entrepreneurship such as mindset of entrepreneurship, self-understanding, network, business models, and to deliver the core concept of interdisciplinary design thinking and communication skills under the teaching of dual-instructors. We expect that this course can train new era interdisciplinary polymaths and enhance their competitiveness. This course also integrates students into the career track in the near future, and inject new power into the industry which is benefit to the society.

name.zh: 人本設計：創新創業設計思考跨域
name.en: Human-oriented Design: Interdisciplinary Experience Course of Innovative and Entrepreneurial Design

notes: 大研合開

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「職涯講座課程」，藉由業界主管與人員介紹不同種類的工作模式，如派遣、公職、舒活族、獵人頭公司、國外企業等，提升學生對於國內外職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率與競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

description.zh: 本課程目的在提升學生在科技與服務創新的知識及了解其各種不同的特性本課程旨在討論服務業可能衍生的經營策略，尤其是與網際網路相關的各種新興的服務產業。
description.en: This is an advanced course for Master students to enhance their theoretical foundation in Technology and Service Innovation. Issues involved are: Systematic View of Technology Innovation; Service Innovation; Service Management; New Service Development

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1. 概論 2. 文化遺產防災之重要性 3. 文化遺產防災之基本策略 4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式 5. 文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

notes: 日職合開

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1) 管理常見之專有名詞，(2) 英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3) 會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4) 企業計劃書的編寫，及 (5) 現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 數據無處不在。隨著真實世界和數位世界交互影響，越來越多的設計決策有望得到數據分析的支持。本課程旨在培養設計師的數據素養技能。首先介紹對個性化產品和服務的需求，是如何從認知及情感面來創造更好的使用者經驗，並將數據資訊轉換為產品知識 / 服務設計 / 系統決策。大部分課堂時間將以研究導向的設計專題方式進行。完成本課程後，您將能夠：1. 區分批量生產及個性化設計 2. 了解如何將數據科學納入設計流程 3. 描述由不同來源（例如人類、機器或環境）生成的數據特徵和形式 4. 應用合適的工具 / 軟體來解釋小型或大型數據集 5. 了解在設計過程中使用數據的倫理與關鍵原則
description.en: Data is everywhere. As the physical and digital worlds have become intertwined, more and more design decisions are expected to be supported by data analytics. Hence, this course aims to build your data literacy skills as a designer. The course will begin by introducing the need for personalized products and services to create a better user experience. This concerns not only the cognitive but also affective aspects. The insights obtained from the data can then be translated to determine product/service/system requirements. Students will spend the majority of the class time on research-oriented projects.Upon completing this course, you will be able to:1.Distinguish the difference between mass production and personalization 2.Gain a better understanding of how data science can be incorporated into the design process 3.Describe the characteristics and forms of data generated by different sources such as humans, machines, or environments 4.Apply suitable tools/software to interpre

description.zh: 設計方法隨著技術演進逐步發展。本課程將介紹從 Design for Manufacturing and Assembly (DFMA) 到 Design for X (DFX) 的設計方法。在創造具有複雜幾何形狀的產品時，3D 列印 (又稱積體製造 additive manufacturing) 是具備潛力的設計工具，特別是對於定制符合人體工程學的設備。本課程將透過專題實作與討論，讓學生探索設計方法對於 3D 列印的影響。完成本課程後，您將能夠：1. 描述設計方法的演變 2. 討論藝術家、設計師和工程師之間的差異 3. 了解不同 3D 列印技術的製程優勢和限制 4. 分解從藝術到零件的 3D 工作流程 5. 使用數位設計工具來優化 3D 零件的應用要求
description.en: Design methodologies can evolve with the emergence of advanced technologies. This course will introduce a historical account of design methodologies from Design for Manufacturing and Assembly (DFMA) to Design for X (DFX). In this regard, additive manufacturing (AM), also known as 3D printing, has great potential for creating products with complex geometric, particularly for custom-fit ergonomic devices. Project-based activities will be carried out for students to explore the effects of good and bad designs for 3D printing.Upon completing this course, you will be able to:1.Describe the evolution of design methodologies 2.Discuss the differences between an artist, a designer, and an engineer   3.Identify the key advantages and process-specific constraints of AM technology4.Breakdown the 3D workflow from art to part  5.Use computational design tools to optimal application requirements for 3D parts

notes: 工設四與日碩合開

description.zh: 協助學員在完成訓練後：1. 對半導體機台的設計原理、操作與預防保養有基礎的概念。2. 對半導體設備實務工作有初步的了解。3. 能結合學校所學理論與產業實務。
description.en: After completing the training, the trainees will: 1.Know the basic concept of the design principle, operation and preventive maintenance about semiconductor tools.2.Have a preliminary understanding of what an equipment engineer does in Fab.3.Be able to combine the theories learned from the school with industrial practices.

notes: 密集授課，至台積電，詳教學大綱【停開】

description.zh: 協助學員在完成訓練後：1. 對半導體設備元件原理與作用有基礎的了解 2. 對半導體設備實務工作有初步的了解 3. 能結合學校所學理論與產業實務。
description.en: After completing the training, the trainees will: 1.Have a basic understanding of the principles and functions of semiconductor equipment components.2.Have a preliminary understanding of what an equipment engineer does in Fab.3.Be able to combine the theories learned from the school with industrial practices.

name.en: Introduction of Equipment Components in Semiconductor

notes: 密集授課，至台積電，詳教學大綱【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有 (1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論 (2) 界面的作用力 (3) 表面及界面的熱力學 (4) 液體和固體界面的熱力學 (5) 表面及界面張力的測量 (6) 接觸角的測量 (7) 吸附的熱力學 (8) 分散液的穩定性 (9) 分散液分子間吸力及斥力 (10) 懸浮液之高分子穩定性 (11) 凝聚 (12) 界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 認識心理與教育測驗的起源、發展、運用與測驗實施及倫理議題，同時探討常模與標準化、信度、效度、測驗研發編製 (含項目分析) 的理論基礎。
description.en: To realize origin, development, application, test implementation and ethical issues of psychological and educational test and explore theories of norms, standardization, reliability, validity and test development (including item analysis)

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生了解現今專利權授予上較具爭議之課題。透過案例閱讀與討論，除使學生明白專利熱門議題外，也了解未來專利之發展趨勢。
description.en: The course provides some important issues, including animal and plant patents, traditional knowledge and genetic resources, computer software, business methods, as well as some recent cases, such as Apple sued HTC.

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

name.en: Special Topics on Internal Combustion Engines

notes: 電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程探討的主題包括：電子商務的定義與架構、市場商機分析與風險評估、電子商務的經營模式及其對傳統經營模式造成的衝擊、顧客界面規劃設計、網路行銷與品牌塑造、實作導入、線上交易機制與資訊安全以及電子商務發展趨勢等相關議題，作深入淺出的探討。並以案例研討方式，加強學生理解，以達到最佳的學習效果。
description.en: This course mainly includes the following topics: 1.Overview of EC; 2.The opportunity and risk evaluation; 3.The business models of EC and impact on traditional businesses. 4. User interface planning; 5.The marketing strategies of EC; 6.How to install an EC; 7.Online transaction mechanisms and information security etc. Some real-world cases will also be discussed to enhance students' understanding and obtain the best learning effects.

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

name.en: Special Topics on Internal Combustion Engines

description.zh: 作業研究是用來處理將有限資源分配於許多競爭性活動的問題上之一種有用的技術，它已經變成眾多企業工業機構的一種標準工具。基於線性規劃的基本知識高等作為研究提供一些有及可靠的運等方法來所決非線性規劃問題及機率模式。一些與實際應用有關的課題諸如有貨理論、等程理論、可靠度及決策理論等將在本課程中以討論。
description.en: This course discusses linear programming, network analysis, dynamic programming, game theory, (non) integer programming, Markov chains (Markovian decision process), queuing theory, inventory models, forecasting models, decision analysis and simulation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

description.zh: 設計思考是一種幫助人們理解與發展解決特定問題的創造性方法，在本課程中，我們將聚焦在如何使用設計思考方法解決聯合國可持續發展目標中所遇到的問題。課程採用教學與工作坊模式，希望能啟發與培養同理心、問題解決能力、溝通與協調能力、透過跨域共創，培育未來跨領域領導人才。
description.en: Design thinking is a methodology that helps people understand and develop creative ways to solve a specific issue.In this course, we will focus on how to use Design thinking method to solving problems in UN SDGs.the course hopes to inspire and teaching students have Empathy, problem solving ability, communication and coordination ability, and foster future cross-disciplinary leaders.

name.zh: 設計思考 - 設計與永續發展

notes: 先鋒 403

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 為掌握產業界的技術新知、學術界的專業研究、藝文界的脈動等，本課程講座將廣邀互動媒體設計的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術等面向，分別以宏觀的政治、社會、文化、科技、環境等角度剖析，另以微觀角度深入個案研究作探討，藉此議題討論互動媒體設計的現況與未來發展趨勢。教學評量將以各項的主題式討論報告為主。
description.en: To understand science and technological information from business, professional research from academic and issues from art and cultural fields, the seminars on interactive media design should be invited these fields of expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion. With the macro-perspective of politics, social, culture, technology and environment, the seminar focuses on the dimension of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art. Besides, the seminars explore case studies with micro-perspective to discuss interactive media design existing and future development. The assessment includes thematic discussion and final report.

name.zh: 互動媒體設計專題講座

notes: 限本系碩班生 7 人 配合 USR 計畫

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

name.zh: 韌性理論與都市規劃設計
